# Direksi

# Board of Directors

Direksi mengelola Perusahaan dan aset-asetnya untuk kepentingan Perusahaan dan Pemegang Saham,{serta bertanggung jawab dalam hal melindungi kepada pengunta pemangku kepada pengunta lainnya. Untuk mencapai saranan dan tujuan bisnis yang telah ditetapkan, Direksi melaksanan strategi dan bertanggung jawab untuk mengimplementasikan dalam kerangka tata kelola perusahaan yang kuat. Direksi juga memiliki wewenang untuk mewakili Perusahaan di depan publik, termasuk di pengadilan. Direksi diangkat dan pengaturanya sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar Perusahaan dan Peraturan OJK No. 33/ POJK.04/2014 tersebut Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten oleh Perusahaan Publik.

# Komposisi Direksi

Direksi Perusahaan terdiri dari lima orang termasuk Direktur Utama. Komposisiiat ini telah sesuai dengan Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 tanggal 8 Desember 2014 tersebut Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik, yang mencayarakan bahwa Direksi sekurang-kurangnya terdiri dari dia orang, sudah satunya diangkat sebagai Direktur Utama.

The Board of Directors manages the Company and its assets in the best interests of the Company and its shareholders, and is responsible for protecting the interests of other stakeholders. In order to achieve the Company's business goals and objectives, the Board formulates strategies and is responsible for implementing them within a framework of strong corporate governance. The Board of Directors is authorized to represent the Company in public, including in a court of law. The Board of Directors is organized in compliance with the Company's Articles of Association and OJK Regulation No. 33/ POJK.04/2014 regarding the Boards of Directors and Boards of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies.

# Composition of the Board of Directors

The Company's Board of Directors consists of five members including the President Director. The current composition complies with OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 dated December 8, 2014 regarding the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of an Issuer or Public Company, which states that the Board of Directors shall have at least two persons, one of whom is appointed as the President Director.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Direksi

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Direksi sebagaimana diatur dalam Pedoman Kerja Direksi adalah sebagai berikut:

1. Menjalankan dan bertanggung jawab atas pengelolaan Perusahaan untuk kepentingan Perusahaan seksuai dengan maksud dan tujuan Perseroan yang ditapkan pada Anggaran Dasar.  
2. Mengelola Perseroan dengan itikad baik dan penuh tanggung jawab serta kehati-hatian.  
3. Menyelenggarakan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan (RUPST) dan RUPS lainnya sebagai bagaimana diatur dalam peraturan perundang-undangan dan Anggaran Dasar.  
4. Membuat.daftarpemegang saham,daftarpemegang saham khusus,risalah RUPS dan risalah rapat Direksi.  
5. Membuat Laporan Tahunan dan Laporan Keuangan Perseroan sebagai dimaksud dalam Undang-undang tersebut dokumen perusahaan.  
6. Memeliharaouseluhdaftar,risalah,dandokumen keuanganPerseroan dan dokumen perusahaan lainnya.  
7. Menyampaikan rencana kerja yang memuat juga Anggaran Tahunan Perseroan kepada Dewan Komisaris untuk mendapatkan persetujuan sebelum tahun buku dimulai.  
8. Rencana kerja harus disampaikan paling lambat 30 hari sebelum tahun buku dimulai.  
9. Menyampaikan Laporan Tahunan kepada RUPST setelah ditinjau oleh Dewan Komisaris dalam jangka waktu paling lambat 6 bulan setelah tahun buku Perseroan berakhir.  
10. Tugas dan tanggung jawab yang tidak diuraikan secara rinci dalam Pedoman ini tetap mengaku pada peraturan perdang-undangan dan peraturan OJK yang berlaku.

# Wewenang Direksi meliputi hal-hal berikut:

1. Direksi berhak mewakili Perusahaan di dalam maupun di luar pengadilan tersebut segala hal dan dalam segala kejadian, mengikat Perusahaan dengan pihak lain dan pihak lain dengan Perusahaan.  
2. Dengan persetujuan Dewan Komisaris, Direksi berhak untuk menjalankan segala tindakan, baik yang mengenai tepengurusan maupun kepemilikan, akan tetapi dengan pembatasan tertentu bahwa untuk:

a. Mendapatkan, melepaskan atas mengagunkan Barang tak bergerak yang berupa aset tetap Perusahaan (yang bukan merupakan Barang dagangan Perusahaan);  
b. Menerima pinjaman dan memberikan pinjaman kepada siapa pun juga melebihi jumlah danjangka waktu yang ditetapkan secara Berkala oleh Dewan Komisaris;

# Duties and Responsibilities of the Board of Directors

The duties and responsibilities of the Board of Directors, as set out in the Board Manual, are as follows:

1. Running and being responsible for the management of the Company for the Company's interests, in accordance with the purpose and objectives stipulated in the Articles of Association.  
2. Managing the Company in good faith and with due responsibility and care  
3. Holding the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (AGMS) and other GMS as set out in the laws and regulations and the Articles of Association.  
4. Making the shareholders' register, special registers, minutes of the GMS and minutes of meetings of the Board of Directors.  
5. Developing the Company's annual report and financial documents as intended in the Law on corporate documents.  
6. Maintaining all the Company's registers, minutes and financialdocumentsaswellasothercorporatedocuments.  
7. Submitting a work plan containing the Company's annual budget to the Board of Commissioners for their approval before the start of the financial year.  
8. The work plan must be submitted no less than 30 days before the start of the financial year.  
9. Submitting the annual report to the AGMS after being reviewed by the Board of Commissioners within no more than 6 months after the end of the financial year.  
10. Duties and responsibilities that are not specified in detail in this Manual refer to the prevailing laws and OJK regulations referred to above.

# The authority of the Board of Directors is as follows:

1. The Board of Directors is entitled to represent the Company in and outside a court of law and to commit the Company to other parties and other parties to the Company.  
2. With the approval of the Board of Commissioners, the Board of Directors is entitled to take any action, whether concerning management or ownership, but with certain limits, to:

a. Obtain, release or to use as collateral the Company's fixed assets (which are not the Company's traded goods);  
b. Receive loans from and loan to any party in excess of an amount and for a duration to be stipulated periodically by the Board of Commissioners;

c. Memberikan jaminan berupa benda/kekayaan Perusahaan atau tersebut Perusahaan sebagai penjamin untuk kepentingan pihak lain untuk menjamin suatu hutang yang melebihi rumah dan sifatnya dari waktu ke waktu ditetapkan oleh rapat Dewan Komisaris;  
d. Mendirikan usahaantu turut serta dalam perusahaan lainantu badan-badan lain.

3. Perbuatan hukum untuk mengalihkan kekayaan Perusahaan memberikan jaminan atas hutang lebih dari  $50\%$  jumlah kekayaan bersih Perusahaan dalam saturansaksi ata lebih, baik yang Berkaitan situ sama lain maupun tidak, dapat dilakukan dengan kondisi tertentu sebagaimana tercantum dalam Pedoman Kerja Direksi.  
4. Direksi dapat memberikan kuasa tertulis kepada orang lain untuk dan atasNama Perusahaan dalam makukan perbuatan hukum tertentu sebagaimana yang diuraikan dalam Surat Kuasa.

The Board Manual is available on the Company's website at www.jayaproperty.com

# Pengangkatan dan Pemberhentian Direksi

Sesuai dengan Pedoman Kerja Direksi, Direksi diangkat oleh Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham untuk masa jabatan 3 tahun dan dapat diangkat kembali. Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham berhak memberhentikan seorang Direktur sewaku-waktu sebelum masa jabatanya berakhir.

Direksi wajib memenuhi kriteria penunjukan yang ditentukan dalam Pedoman Kerja Direksi.

# Orientasi untuk Direktur Baru

Anggota Direksi yangbaru menerima orientasi menyeluruh mengenai visi, misi, nilai-nilai, kode etik, struktur organisasi, lini usaha Perusahaan, Pedoman Kerja Direksi, serta hukum dan peraturan perdang-undangan yang berlaku diasar modal. Tidak ada Direktur Barang yang diangkat pada tahun 2023.

# Pengembangan Kompetensi Direksi

Perusahaan tidak memberikan pelatihan khusus kepada program pengembangan kompetensi bagi Direksi di tahun 2023. Namun, untuk memastikan Direksi dapat menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya secara efektif, anggota Direksi diharapkan untuk terus memperbaharui dan memperluan pengetahuan dan keahlian merekaenting hal-hal yang berkaitan dengan ruang lingkup pekerjaan mereka.

# Rapat Direksi

Penyelenggaraan Rapat Direksi produktu pada Pedoman Kerja Direksi dan Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014. Rapat diadakan minimal sebelum sekali. Jika anggota Direksi tidak dapat menchadiri rapat secara fisik, mereka dapat berpartisipasi secara virtual melalui media elektronik. Setiap tahun Direksi aktivasi dengan Dewan Komisaris paling kurang 1 (satu) kali dalam 4 (empat) bulan.

Jadwal rapat Direksi setiap tahunnya ditentukan pada akhir tahun sebelumnya. Materi rapat dibagikan kepada peserta rapat paling lambat 5 hari sebelum rapat. Rapat dipimpin oleh Direktur Utama kecuali beliau berhalangan hadir, dalam hal ini,maka Direksi Komisaris akan memilih telah seorang Direktur yang hadir sebagai Ketua Rapat.

The Company's policy in reporting share ownership of members of the Board of Director refers to Article 2 OJK Regulation No. 11/ POJK.04/2017 concerning Ownership Report or Any Change in Share Ownership of a Public Company.

The Company has submitted the report on any changes of the Board of Directors' share ownership in 2023 through the e-reporting system to OJK and IDX as a form of compliance with internal and external policies regarding share ownership reports.

# Appointment and Dismissal of the Board of Directors

In accordance with the Board Manual, Directors are appointed by the General Meeting of Shareholders for a term of 3 years, which may be renewed. The General Meeting of Shareholders reserves the right to dismiss a Director at any time before their term expires.

The Board of Directors are required to fulfill the appointment criteria specified in the Board Manual.

# Orientation for New Directors

New members of the Board of Directors receive a comprehensive orientation to the Company's vision, mission, values, code of conduct, organization structure, lines of business, the Board Manual, and capital market laws and regulations. No new Directors were appointed in 2023.

# Competency Development for the Board of Directors

The Company did not provide any specific training or competency development for the Directors in 2023. However, to ensure that they can undertake their duties and responsibilities effectively, members of the Board are expected to continuously update and broaden their knowledge and expertise on matters related to their scope of work.

# Board of Directors' Meetings

The organization of Board of Directors' Meetings refers to the Board Manual and OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014. Meetings are held at least once a month. If a Board member cannot physically attend a meeting, they may participate virtually via electronic media. Every year the Board of Directors holds at least 1 (one) time in 4 (four) months joint meetings with the Board of Commissioners.

The annual Board meeting schedule is agreed at the end of the previous year. Participants receive the meeting materials no later than 5 days before the meeting. The President Director chairs the meetings unless he or she is unable to attend, in which case the other Directors in attendance will select one of the Directors to serve as Chairman of the meeting.

Kuorum rapat tercapai apabila lebih dari  $50\%$  dari seluruh anggota Direksi hadir kepada diwakili dalam rapat. Keputusan diambil berdasarkan musyawarah untuk mufakat, tetapi apabila mufakat tidak tercapai, keputusan dapat diambil dengan suara terbanyak lebih dari setengah jumliah anggota yang hadir, dengan Direktur Utama memberikan suara penentu.

Direksi telah melaksanan 17 kaliRAPATdengan detail sebagai berikut:

12 kali Rapat Direksi  
3 kali Rapat Direksi bersama Dewan Komisaris  
1 kali Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan  
1 kali Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa

A quorum is reached when more than  $50\%$  of all members of the Board of Directors attend or are represented at a meeting. Decisions are taken by consensus, but if a consensus cannot be reached, decisions may be taken by a majority vote of more than half of the members present, with the President Director casting the deciding vote.

# Sekretaris Perusahaan

Unit Sekretaris Perusahaan mendukung pelaksanaan tugas Direksi, yaitu:

- Menyelenggaraman Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan dan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Lainnya sebagai manana diatur dalam peraturan perundangan dan anggaran dasar Perusahaan;  
- Membuat Daftar Pemegang Saham, Risalah RUPS, dan Risalah Rapat Direksi;  
- Membuat Laporan Tahunan Perusahaan;  
- Membuat Laporan Keberlanjutan Perusahaan;  
Menjalankan fungsi Tata Kelola Perusahaan yang Baik;  
- Menjalankan fungsi kepadahan terhadap peraturan yang berlaku di bidang pasar modal;  
- Memelihara Seluruh.daftar, risalah, dan dokumen penting Perusahaan lainnya.

# Corporate Secretary

The Corporate Secretary unit supports the implementation of the duties of the Board of Directors, namely:

- Organizing the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders and Other General Meetings of Shareholders as stipulated in the laws and regulations and the articles of association of the Company;  
Preparing the Securities Holders Registration, Minutes of GMS, and Minutes of Board of Directors Meetings;  
Preparing the Company's Annual Report;  
Preparing the Company's Sustainability Report;  
- Carry out the function of Good Corporate Governance;  
- Carry out the function of compliance on applicable regulations in the capital market;  
- Maintaining all Company registers, minutes, and other important documents.

Standar kinerja tahunan dari masing-masing aspek ditentukan oleh Direksi setelah mempertimbangkan masukan dari unit kerja. Penilaian kinerja dilaporkan oleh Sekretaris Perusahaan kepada Direksi 2 kali dalam setahun.

Setelah seksretaris Perusahaan, serta mempertimbangkan penilaian kinerja yang dilaporkan oleh Sekretaris Perusahaan di tahun 2023, Direksi menetapkan Bahwa Unit Sekretaris Perusahaan telah bekerja dengan baik sesuai dengan tugas dan fungsi yang ditetapkan.

# Unit Audit Internal

Unit Audit Internal mendukung pelaksanaan tugas Direksi, yaitu menjalankan pengurusan Perusahaan untuk kepentingan Perusahaan sesuai dengan maksud dan tujuan Perusahaan yang ditetapkan dalam Anggaran Dasar Perusahaan, antara lain:

- Menyusun dan melaksanakan rencana Audit Internalahan;  
- Menguji danMMC megevaluasi pelaksanaan pengendalian internal dan system manajemen risiko sesuai dengan kebjikan perusahaan;  
Melakukan pemeriksaan dan penilaian atas efisiensi dan efektivitas di bidang keuangan, akuntansi, operasional, sumber daya manusia, pemasaran, tekologi informasi, dan kegiatan lainnya;  
- Memberikan saran perbaikan dan informasi yang objektif tersebut kegiatan yang diperiksa pada semua tingkat manajemen;  
- Membuat laporan tersebut audit dan menyampaikan laporan tersebut kepada direktur utama dan Dewan Komisaris;  
- Memantau, menganalisis dan melaporkan pelaksanaan tindak lanjut perbaikan yang telah disarankan;  
- Bekerja sama dengan Komite Audit;  
- Menyusun program untuk mengevaluasi mutu kegiatan audit internal yang dilakukannya;  
Melakukan pemeriksaan khusus apabila diperlukan.

Standar kinerja tatsächenan dari masing-masing aspek ditentukan oleh Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi setelah mempertimbangkan masukan dari unit kerja. Penilaian kinerja dilaporkan oleh Ketua Unit Audit Internal kepada Direksi paling kurang 1 kalı dalam setahun.

Setelah menjadi evaluasi terhadap proses kerja dan telah dari Unit Audit Internal, seda mempertimbangkan penilaian kinerja yang dilaporkan oleh Ketua Unit Audit Internal di tahun 2023, Direksi menetapkan kepada Unit Audit Internal telah bekerja dengan baik tersebut dengan tugas dan fungsi yang ditetapkan.

The annual performance standards of each aspect are determined by the Board of Directors after considering inputs from working units. Performance assessment is reported by the Corporate Secretary to the Board of Directors twice a year.

After evaluating the work process and results of the Corporate Secretary Unit, as well as considering the performance assessment reported by the Corporate Secretary in 2023, the Board of Directors determined that the Corporate Secretary Unit has worked well in accordance with the duties and functions that have been set.

# Internal Audit Unit

The Internal Audit Unit supports the implementation of the duties of the Board of Directors, namely carrying out the management of the Company for the benefit of the Company in accordance with the purposes and objectives of the Company set forth in the Company's Articles of Association, among others:

Prepare and implement an annual Internal Audit plan;  
- Test and evaluate the implementation of internal control and risk management systems in accordance with company policy;  
- Examine and assess the efficiency and effectiveness in finance, accounting, operations, human resources, marketing, information technology, and other activities;  
- Provide suggestions for improvement and objective information about the activities examined at all levels of management;  
Prepare an audit report and submit the report to the President Director and the Board of Commissioners;  
Monitor, analyze and report on the implementation of follow-up improvements that have been suggested;  
- Working closely with the Audit Committee;  
Develop a program to evaluate the quality of internal audit activities performed;  
Conduct special audit if necessary.

The annual performance standards of each aspect are determined by the Board of Directors after considering input from the work units. Performance assessment is reported by the Chairman of Internal Audit Unit to the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors at least once a year.

After evaluating the work process and results of the Internal Audit Unit, as well as considering the performance assessment reported by the Head of the Internal Audit Unit in 2023, the Board of Directors determined that the Internal Audit Unit has worked well in accordance with its duties and functions.

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris adalah sebagai untuk, sebagai komisari, dan Undang-Undang No. 40 Tahun 2007 tidak Perseoan Terbatas:

The Board of Commissioners supervises the management of the Company and offers constructive advice and guidance to the Board of Directors. The Board of Commissioners is also responsible for overseeing corporate governance within the Company. Each member of the Board acts independently in fulfilling their duties and responsibilities to the Company. The Board of Commissioners reports to the shareholders and is appointed and organized in compliance with the Company's Articles of Association and OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 regarding the Boards of Directors and Boards of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies.

# Duties, Responsibilities, and Authority of the Board of Commissioners

The duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners include the following, as specified in the Company's Articles of Association, the Board Charter, and Law No. 40/2007 on Limited Liability Companies:

1. Supervising management policy, the overall running of the management of both the Company and its business, and providing advice to the Board of Directors, as well as fulfilling their duties and responsibilities in good faith and with due responsibility and care.  
2. Reporting to the General Meeting of Shareholders on the implementation of their supervisory duties during the last financial year.

3. Melakukan tinjauan dan menganalisa Laporan Tahunan yang disusun oleh Direksi dan menandatangani Laporan tersebut.  
4. Dalam kondisi tertentu, Dewan Komisaris wajib menyelenggaraman Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan dan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham lainnya sesuai dengan kewenangannya sebagaimana diatur dalam peraturan perundang-undangan dan Anggaran Dasar.  
5. Dalam rangka mendukung efektivitas pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Dewan Komisaris wajib membrentuk Komite Audit dan dapat membrentuk komite lainnya.  
6. Dalam hal tidak dibentuknya komite lainnya, fungsi komite lainnya yang diatur dalam peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) wajib dijalankan oleh Dewan Komisaris.  
7. Tugas dan tanggung jawab yang tidak diuraikan secara rinci dalam Pedoman Kerja ini tetap kepada peraturan perundang-undangan dan peraturan OJK yang berlaku.

Wewenang Dewan Komisaris telah sebagai aktivut:

1. Dewan Komisaris berhak untuk mendapatkan penjelasan dari Direksi ataunggota lainnya mengenai halapa pun, seksuai permintaan Dewan Komisaris.  
2. Anggota Dewan Komisaris berhak untuk memasuki bangunan beserta halamanya dan tempat lainnya yang digunakan kepada dikendalan oleh Perusahaan akan pun dalam jam kerja dan untuk memeriksa pembukuan, korespondensi dan bukti lainnya, serta memeriksa dan pembuktikan adanya uang kas dan Barang lainnya, dan berhak untuk mengetahui mengenai setiap tindakan yang diambil oleh Direksi.  
3 Dewan Komisaris dapat sewaktu-waktu memberhentikan situ atau lebih dari anggota Direksi jika Direksi tersebut telah bertindak melanggar Anggaran Dasar dan/atau peraturan perdang-undangan yang berlaku, atau mengganggu maksud dan tujuan Perusahaan atau mengabaikan kewajibannya.  
4. Pemberhentian tersebut harus diberitahukan secara tertulis kepada Direktur erkait, beserta alasanya

# Pedoman/Piagam Kerja Dewan Komisaris

Dewan Komisaris Perusahaan memiliki Pedoman/ Piagam Kerja yang menjelaskan tersebut fungsi, tanggung jawab, dan pengaturan kerja Dewan Komisaris. Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris tersedia di situs web Perusahaan, www.jayaproperty.com.

Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris mencakup hal berikut:

1. Fungsi Dewan Komisaris;  
2. Konsep Umum Pengawasan Dewan Komisaris;  
3. Keanggotaan, Komposisi dan Pengangkatan Dewan Komisaris;

3. Reviewing and analyzing the annual report prepared by the Board of Directors and signing said report.  
4. Under certain circumstances, the Board of Commissioners must convene an Annual General Meeting of Shareholders and other General Meetings of Shareholders in accordance with their authority as specified in the laws and regulations and the Articles of Association.  
5. In order to support the effective execution of their duties and responsibilities, the Board of Commissioners must establish an Audit Committee and they may also establish other committees.  
6. If such other committees are not established, the functions concerned, as specified in the regulations of the Financial Services Authority (OJK), must be performed by the Board of Commissioners.  
7. Duties and responsibilities that are not specified in detail in this Manual refer to the prevailing laws and OJK regulations referred to above.

The authority of the Board of Commissioners includes the following:

1. The Board of Commissioners is entitled to seek an explanation from the Board of Directors or any member thereof regarding any matter, as required by the Board of Commissioners.  
2. Members of the Board of Commissioners are entitled to enter the buildings and other premises used or controlled by the Company at any time during office hours and to inspect any of the books, correspondence and other evidence, and to inspect and verify the existence of cash and other items, and is entitled to know about any and all actions taken by the Board of Directors.  
3. The Board of Commissioners may at any time suspend one or more members of the Board of Directors of said Directors has acted in contravention of the Articles of Association and/or the prevailing laws and regulations, or interfered with the purpose and objectives of the Company or neglected their obligations.  
4. Such suspension must be notified in writing to the Director(s) concerned, accompanied by the reasons.

# Appointment and Dismissal of the Board of Commissioners

Commissioners are appointed by the General Meeting of Shareholders for a 3-years term, and they may be reappointed for further terms. The General Meeting of Shareholders has the right to dismiss a member of the Board of Commissioners at any time before his or her term expires.

All member of the Board of Commissioners must meet the appointment criteria stipulated in the Board Manual.

# Independent Commissioners

OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 states that at least  $30\%$  of the members of the Board of Commissioners must be independent. As one of the Company's three Commissioners is independent, this requirement has been met.

# Appointment Criteria for Independent Commissioners

In accordance with the Board Manual and OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014, an Independent Commissioner is an individual who:

1. Is not affiliated with the majority shareholder, or with other members of the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners, or the Company;  
2. Has not worked or held authority and responsibility for planning, directing, controlling, or supervising the activities of the Company within the last six (6) months, except in the case of the reappointment of an Independent Commissioner of the Company for the next period;

3. Tidak memiliki saham, baik secara langsung maupun tidak langsung, di dalam Perusahaan;  
4. Tidak memiliki hubungan usaha,基本原则 langsung maupun tidak langsung, yang berhubungan dengan aktivitas usaha Perusahaan.

Komisaris Independen Perusahaan telah memenuhi ketentuan tersebut.

Sebagaimana diatur dalam Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris dan Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014, Dewan Komisaris wajib menjadi rapat setidaknya sekali dalam 2 (dua) bulan. Dewan Komisaris wajib menjadi rapat bersama Direksi secara Berkala paling kurang 1 (satu) kali dalam 4 (empat) bulan. Rapat tambahan dapat diselenggarakan atas permintaan tertulis dari tahun untuk beberapa Komisaris, oleh tahun untuk beberapa Direktur, oleh tahun untuk beberapa Pemegang Saham yang secara kolektif kepemilikan sahamnya setidaknya mewakili sepersepuluh dari seluruh saham Perusahaan dengan hak suara. Anggota yang tidak dapat menghadiri rapat Dewan Komisaris secara fisik dapat berpartisipasi secara virtual melalui media elektronik.

3. Does not hold any shares, either directly or indirectly, in the Company;

Mr Okky Dharmosetio as the new Independent Commissioner has received orientation on the Company's vision, mission, values, code of ethics, organizational structure, line of business, and Board of Commissioners Charter, as well as relevant laws and regulations.

# Competency Development for the Board of Commissioners

In the interests of undertaking their responsibilities effectively, members of the Board of Commissioners are expected to keep themselves informed about recent developments related to corporate governance, the Company's field of business and any other matters related to their function. The Company did not provide any specific training or competency development for the member of the Board of Commissioners during 2023.

# Board of Commissioners' Meetings

As stipulated in the Board Manual and in OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014, the Board of Commissioners is required to meet at least once every 2 (two) months. The Board of Commissioners must hold a joint meeting with the Board of Directors on a regular basis at least 1 (one) time in 4 (four) months. Additional meetings may be held at the written request of one or more of the Commissioners, or one or more of the Directors, or one or more shareholders whose collective shareholdings represent at least one-tenth of all the Company's shares with voting rights. Members who cannot physically attend a Board of Commissioners' meeting may participate virtually via electronic media.

Jadwal rapat Dewan Komisaris setup tanhnya ditentukan pada akhir tahun sebelumnya. Materi rapat dibagikan kepada peserta rapat paling lambat 5 hari sebelum rapat. Rapat dipimpin oleh Komisaris Utama kecuali beliau berhalangan hadir, dalam hal ini.make Dewan Komisaris akan memilih sudah seorang Komisaris yang hadir sebagai Ketua Rapat.

Kuorum rapat tercapai apabila lebih dari  $50\%$  dari seluruh anggota Dewan Komisaris hadir atas diwakili dalam rapat. Keputusan diambil berdasarkan musyawarah untuk mufakat, tetapi apabila mufakat tidak tercapai, keputusan dapat diambil dengan suara terbanyak lebih dari setengah jumlah anggota yang hadir.

Dewan Komisaris telah melaksanakan 11 kali rapat dengan detail sebagai perikut:

- 6 kali Rapat Dewan Komisaris  
3 kali Rapat Dewan Komisaris bersama Direksi  
1 kali Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan  
1 kali Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa

Meetings are chaired by the President Commissioner unless he or she is unable to attend, in which case the Commissioners select one of the Commissioners who is present as the Chairman of the meeting.

A quorum is reached when more than  $50\%$  of all members of the Board of Commissioners attend or are represented at a meeting. Decisions are taken by consensus, but if a consensus cannot be reached, decisions may be taken by a majority vote of more than half of the members present.

# Penilaian Kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Kinerja Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dievaluasi setiap tahun. Hasil penilaian kinerja Direksi menjadi pecetaan kompetensi di tingkat manajemen senior, dan juga menjadi bahan pertimbangan dalam penentuan remunerasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi.

# Performance Assessment of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

The performance of both the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors is evaluated annually. The results of the Board of Directors' performance assessment guide the mapping of competencies at the senior management level, and are also taken into account in the determination of Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors' remuneration.

# Dewan Komisaris

# Prosedur Penilaian

Penilaian kinerja Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dilakukan melalui mekanisme RUPST Perusahaan, yang mana para pemegang saham manusil kerija Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi berdasarkan laporan kinerja Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi yang dilaporkan kepada pemegang saham. Berdasarkan laporan tersebut, pemegang saham melakukan penilaian terhadap kinerja Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Selama tahun buku berjalan.

Selain itu, Dewan Komisaris juga memiliki kebijakan penilaian sendiri (self assessment), kebijakan self assessment Dewan Komisaris merupakan suatu pedoman yang digunakan sebagai pentuk akuntabilitas atas penilaian kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara kolegial. Self assessment atau penilaian sendiri dimaksud dilakukan oleh masing-masing anggota untuk menilai pelaksanaan kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara kolegial, dan bukan menilai kinerja individual masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris. Dengan adanya self assessment ini diharapkan masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dapat berkontribusi untuk memperbaiki kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara berkesinambungan.

Dewan Komisaris melakukan self assessment secara kolegial paling kurang 1 kali dalam setahun.

Pada tahun 2023, Dewan Komisaris melaksanakan 1 kali self assessment secara kolegial.

# - Pihak yang Melakukan Penilaian

Kinerja Dewan Komisaris dinilai oleh Pemegang Saham dan self assessment secara kolegial.

# - Kriteria Penilaian

Penilaian Pemegang Saham atas kinerja Dewan Komisaris dan self assessment Dewan Komisaris diukur dari kinerja Perusahaan terhadap target tahunannya.

# Direksi

# Prosedur Penilaian

Kinerja Direksi dievaluasi baik secara internal maupun eksternal. Dua kali dalam setahun, Direksi makukan penilaian mandiri terhadap Key Performance Indicators (KPI).

# - Pihak yang Melakukan Penilaian

Direksi menjadi kinerja individu dan kolektifnya sendiri, telahnya diverifikasi oleh Dewan Komisaris.

# Board of Commissioners

# Assessment Procedure

The performance assessment of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors is conducted through the Company's AGMS mechanism, where the shareholders assess the performance of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors based on the performance report of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors reported to the shareholders. Based on the report, the shareholders assess the performance of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors during the current financial year.

In addition, the Board of Commissioners also has a self-assessment policy, the Board of Commissioners' self-assessment policy is a guideline used as a form of accountability for the collegial performance assessment of the Board of Commissioners. The self-assessment is carried out by each member to assess the performance of the Board of Commissioners collegially, and not to assess the individual performance of each member of the Board of Commissioners. With this self-assessment, it is expected that each member of the Board of Commissioners can contribute to improving the performance of the Board of Commissioners on an ongoing basis.

The Board of Commissioners conducts a collegial self-assessment at least once a year.

In 2023, the Board of Commissioners conducted 1 collegial self-assessment.

# Parties Conducting the Assessment

The Board of Commissioners' performance is assessed by the shareholders.

# Assessment Criteria

Shareholders' assessment of the Board of Commissioners' performance and the Board of Commissioners' self-assessment is measured against the Company's performance against its annual targets.

# Board of Directors

# - Assessment Procedure

The Board of Directors' performance is evaluated both internally and externally. Twice a year, the Board of Directors undertake a self-assessment against their Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).

# Parties Conducting the Assessment

The Directors assess their own individual and collective performance, the results are verified by the Board of Commissioners.

# - Kriteria Penilaian

Self assessment didasarkan pada KPI, yang mencakup aspek-aspek berikut:

a. Keuangan (pertumbuhan bisnis, efisiensi biaya, dan aspek terkait lainnya);  
b. Pelanggan (kualitas Produk, inovasi Produk, dan aspek terkait lainnya);  
c. Proses Internal (serah terima dan aspek terkait lainnya);  
d. Pembelajaran dan Pertumbuhan (Pengadaan lahan, Indeks Kepuasan Karyawan, dan aspek terkait lainnya).

Selainitu,para tahun 2023,Dewan Komisaris Perusahaan makukan evaluasi atas kinerja anggota Direksi.Termasuk di dalam indicator evaluasi kinerja Direksi telah:

a. Pencapaian target keuangan;  
b. Rencana pengembangan bisnis;  
c. Evaluasi operasional tahun berjalan;  
d. Kehadiran dalam rapat.

# Penilaian Dewan Komisaris称之
Kinerja Komite yang Mendukung
Pelaksanaan Tugas Dewan Komisaris

Dewan Komisaris telah membrentuk Komite Audit untuk mendukung fungsi pengawasannya. Kinerja Komite dievaluasi setiap tahun oleh Dewan Komisaris berdasarkan pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabmereka yang telah ditentukan dalam Piagam Komite Audit, pencapaian tujuan dalam rencana kerja tahunannya, dan kehadirannya dalam rapat. Dewan Komisaris merasa Komite Audit telah bekerja secara efektif sepanjang tahun.

# Assessment Criteria

The self-assessment is based on the KPIs, which cover the following aspects:

a. Financial (business growth, cost efficiency, and others);  
b. Customers (product quality, product innovation, and others);  
c. Internal Process (handover and others);  
d. Learning and Growth (Land acquisition, Employee Satisfaction Index and others).

In addition, in 2023, the Company's Board of Commissioners conducted an evaluation of the performance of the members of the Board of Directors. Included in the performance evaluation indicators of the Board of Directors are:

a. Achievement of financial targets;  
b. Business development plan;  
c. Evaluation of the current year's operations;  
d. Attendance at the meeting.

# Board of Commissioners' Assessment of the Performance of Committees that Support the Implementation of the Board of Commissioners' Duties

The Board of Commissioners has established an Audit Committee to support its oversight function. The Committee's performance is evaluated annually by the Board the based on their execution of the duties and responsibilities specified in the Audit Committee Charter, their achievement of the objectives in their annual work plan, and their attendance at meetings. The Board is satisfied that the Audit Committee performed effectively during the year.

# Fungsi Nominasi

PerusahaanbelummemilikiKomiteNominasi danRemunerasi. Fungsi Nominasi lijalankanlehewan Komisaris.

The Company's policy and procedure for nominating members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors are explained briefly below.

1. The nomination of the candidate Commissioners and/or Directors proposed by the Board of Commissioners or Board of Directors or Shareholders is submitted to the Board of Commissioners, which serves as the Nomination and Remuneration Committee.  
2. The Board of Commissioners conducts the selection of the candidate Commissioner and/or Director through a process that includes following:

a. Analysis of the track records and competencies of the candidate Commissioners and/or Directors;  
b. Interview of the candidates; and  
c. If necessary, a Fit and Proper Test conducted by an Independent Assessor.

3. The Board of Commissioners submits the recommendation on the selected candidate Commissioner and/or Director to the Controlling Shareholder.  
4. The Board of Commissioners requests the approval of the Controlling Shareholder for the selected candidate.  
5. The candidate Commissioner and/or Director is proposed to the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders to be approved as a member of the Board of Commissioners and/or Board of Directors.

The procedure for assessing members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors can be seen in the sub-chapter "Performance Assessment of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners" above.

# Nomination Function

The Company does not have a Nomination and Remuneration Committee. The Nomination function is carried out by the Board of Commissioners.

# Remunerasi Anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

Remuneration of Members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

# Kebijakan Remunerasi

Perusahaan bertekad untuk menawarkan remunerasi yang kompetitif kepada Dewan Komisaris dan Direksinya yang memadai untuk menarik dan mempertahankan individu-individu Berkualitas tinggi dan tersebut dengan tanggung jawab, keterampilan, dan pengalaman mereka. Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan (RUPST) menentukan jujiah remunerasi tahunan yang dibayarkan kepada Komisaris berdasarkan kinerja masing-masing dan kinerja Perusahaan secara keseluruhan. Kewenangan untuk menetapkan atas remunerasi bagi Direksi dilimpahkan oleh RUPS kepada Dewan Komisaris. Pada tahun 2023, RUPST menceturjui Bahwa remunerasi yang diberikan kepada Dewan Komisaris maksimal sebesar  $5,5\%$  dari tahun lalu.

# Fungsi Remunerasi

Perusahaan belum memiliki Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi. Fungsi remunerasi dijalankan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

# Struktur Remunerasi

Remunerasi yang diberikan Perusahaan terdiri dariuang jasa ata honorarium bulanan serta berbagai tunjangan.

# Prosedur untuk menentukan dan mengusulkan jumlah remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

1. RUPST mendelegasikan kewenangan untuk menetapkan jumlah remunerasi kepada Dewan Komisaris.  
2. Dewan Komisaris meninja remunerasi yang ada untuk ini dan menetapkan jumah yangantu, dengan mempertimbangkan kinerja dan kondisi keuangan Perusahaan, kinerja Komisaris dan Direksi,{serta tinjauan benchmark tidak ukur atas kompressasi yang dibayarkan pada perusahaan sejenis.  
3. Dewan Komisaris mengusulkan perubahan jumlah remunerasi kepada Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan untuk disahkan.

# Remunerasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Tahun 2023

Remunerasi sejumlah Rp 12,6 miliar telah diberikan kepada Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi untuk tahun yang berakhir pada tanggal 31 Desember 2023.

# Remuneration Policy

The Company aims to offer its Commissioners and Directors a competitive remuneration that is sufficient to attract and retain high caliber individuals and matches their responsibilities, skills and experience. The Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (AGMS) determines the annual amount of remuneration paid to the Commissioners based on their individual performance and the overall performance of the Company. The authority to determine the remuneration amount for the Directors is delegated by the AGMS to the Board of Commissioners. In 2023, the AGMS agreed that the remuneration paid to the Board of Commissioners should increase by a maximum of  $5.5\%$  of the previous year's salary/honorarium.

# Remuneration Function

The Company does not have a Nomination and Remuneration Committee. The remuneration function is carried out by the Board of Commissioners.

# Remuneration Structure

The remuneration paid by the Company consists of a monthly salary or honorarium as well as various allowances.

# Procedure for determining and proposing the remuneration amount of Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

1. The AGMS delegates the authority to determine the remuneration amount to the Board of Commissioners.  
2. The Board of Commissioners reviews the current year's remuneration and determines the new amount, taking into consideration the Company's performance and financial condition, the performance of the Commissioners and Directors, and benchmark reviews of the compensation paid at peer companies.  
3. The Board of Commissioners proposes the revised amount to the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders for their endorsement.

# Remuneration of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors in 2023

A total of Rp 12.6 billion was paid in remuneration to the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors for the year ending December 31, 2023.

# Komite Audit

Audit Committee

Komite Audit merupakan badan independenyang mendukung Dewan Komisaris dalam melaksanakan fungsi pengawasan dengan memberikan kepastian atas integritas laporan keuangan Perusahaan dan kepada hukum, mengkaji efektivitasystem manajemen risiko,pengendalian internal serta audit internal,dan mengawasi audit eksternal.Temuanmereka memungkinkan Manajemen untuk mengidentifikasi risiko dan potensi kelemahan, yang diperbaiki oleh departemen erkait.

# Dasar Hukum Pembentukan Komite Audit

Komite Audit dibentuk seksuai dengan hukum dan peraturan perundang-undangan berikut:

- POJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015 tanggal 23 Desember 2015,—tengtang Pembentukan dan Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja Komite Audit;  
- POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 tanggal 8 Desember 2014,—tentang Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten—toau Perusahaan Publik;

# Keanggotaan & Pengangkatan Komite Audit

Komite Audit diketuai��作 Komisaris Independen Perusahaan dan beranggotakan dua orang lainnya yang tidak terafiliasi dengan Perusahaan. Dua dari anggota Komite Audit memiliki pengalaman profesional di bidang akuntansi. Dengan demikian, komposisi Komite Audit telah memenuhi ketentuan Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015.

Anggota Komite Audit diangkat oleh Dewan Komisaris untuk masa jabatan yang tidak boleh melebihi masa jabatan Dewan Komisaris saat ini. Anggota dapat diangkat untuk tahunperiode berikutnya. Semua anggota harus memenuhi persyaratan keanggotaan yang ditentukan dalam Piagam Komite Audit.

The Audit Committee is an independent body that supports the Board of Commissioners' supervision function by providing assurance on the integrity of the Company's financial disclosures and legal compliance, reviewing the effectiveness of risk management, internal controls and the internal audit, and overseeing the external audit. Their oversight assists Management in identifying risks and potential weaknesses, so that they can be addressed by the departments concerned.

# Legal Basis for the Establishment of the Audit Committee

The Audit Committee was established in accordance with the following laws and regulations:

OJK Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015 dated 23 December 2015 concerning the Establishment and Working Guidelines of Audit Committees;  
OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 dated 8 December 2014 concerning the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of an Issuer or Public Company;

# Audit Committee Membership & Appointment

The Audit Committee is chaired by the Company's Independent Commissioner and includes two other members who are not affiliated with the Company. Two of the members have professional accounting experience. The composition of the Audit Committee therefore complies with the provisions of OJK Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015.

Members of the Audit Committee are appointed by the Board of Commissioners for a term that must not exceed the term of the current Board of Commissioners. Members may be appointed for one subsequent term. All members must fulfill the membership requirements specified in the Audit Committee Charter.

# Pernyataan Independensi Komite Audit

Berdasarkan ketentuan Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015tentang Pembentukan dan Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja KomiteAudit, Piagam Komite Audit menetapkan bahwa anggota harsemenuhi kriteria independensi sebagai berikut:

1. Anggota Komite Audit bukan merupakan orang dalam Kantor Akuntan Publik, Kantor Konsultan Hukum, Kantor Jasa Penilai Publik kepada pihak lain yang memberi jasa asurans, jasa non-asurans, jasa penilai dan/atau jasa konsultasi lain kepada Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik yang bersangkutan dalam waktu 6 (enam) bulan terakhir;  
2. Anggota Komite Audit bukan merupakan orang yang bekerja kepada mempunyai wewenang dan tanggung jawab untuk merencanakan, memimpin, mengendalan, kepada mengawasi kegiatan Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik tersebut dalam waktu 6 (enam) bulan terakhir, kecuali Komisaris Independen;  
3. Anggota Komite Audit tidak mempunyai saham langsung maupun tidak langsung pada Perusahaan;  
4. Anggota Komite Audit tidak mempunyai hubungan Afliasi dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris, anggota Direksi, atas Pemegang Saham Utama Perusahaan;  
5. Anggota Komite Audit tidak mempunyai hubungan usaha baik langsung maupun tidak langsung yang Berkaitan dengan kegiatan usaha Perusahaan.

Seluruh anggota Komite Audit, soit ini sudah memenuhi kriteria di atas dan selelu melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawab secara independen.

# Audit Committee Independence Statement

Based on the provisions of OJK Regulation No.55/POJK.04/2015 regarding the Establishment and Working Guidelines of Audit Committees, the Audit Committee Charter specifies that members must meet the following independence criteria:

1. Members of the Audit Committee are not persons in the Public Accounting Firm, Legal Consultant Firm, Public Appraisal Service Office or other parties that provide assurance services, non-assurance services, appraisal services and/or other consulting services to the Issuer or Public Company concerned within the last 6 (six) months;  
2. Audit Committee member is not a person who works or has the authority and responsibility to plan, lead, control, or supervise the activities of the Issuer or Public Company within the last 6 (six) months, except for Independent Commissioner;

3. Audit Committee members do not have direct or indirect shares in the Perusahaan;  
4. Audit Committee members have no affiliation with members of the Board of Commissioners, members of the Board of Directors, or Main Shareholders of the Company;  
5. Audit Committee members have no direct or indirect business relationship related to the business activities of the Company.

All members of the Audit Committee currently fulfill the above criteria and always carry out their duties and responsibilities independently.

# Pengembangan Kompetensi Anggota Komite Audit

Dalam rangka menjalankan tanggung jawabnya secara efektif, anggota Komite Audit diharapkan selelu mengetahui perkembangan terkini terkait hal-hal yang berkaitan dengan fungsinya. Perusahaan tidak mengadakan pelatihan ata pengembangan kompetensi khusus bagi anggota Komite Audit selama tahun 2023.

# Piagam Komite Audit

Piagam Komite Audit, yang disahkan pada tanggal 29 Juni 2016, membuat tugas, tanggung jawab, dan wewenang Komite Audit. Piagam tersebut dapat dilihat di situs web Perusahaan, www.jayaproperty.com.

Piagam Komite Audit meliputi hal-hal sebagai berikut:

1. Dasar Peraturan;  
2. Tujuan;  
3. Komposisi, Struktur, dan Keanggotaan;  
4. Persyaratan Keanggotaan dan Masa Jabatan;  
5. Tugas, Tanggung Jawab, dan Wewenang;  
6. Tata Cara dan Prosedur Kerja;  
7. Kebijakan Penyelenggaraan Rapat;  
8. Pelaporan

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Audit

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Komite Audit, sebagai manada dijelaskan dalam Piagam, adalah sebagai berikut:

- Melakukan penelaahan atas informasi keuangan yang dikeluarkan Perseroan;  
- Memberikan rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenai penunjukan oleh penunjukan ulang dari auditor eksternal;  
- Melakukan penelaahan atas ketaatan terhadap peraturan perundang-undangan tersebut modal dan peraturan lain yang berlaku;  
- Menjaga kerahasiaan dokumen, data, dan informasi Perseroan;  
- Menelaah dan mangevaluasi dapat audit yang dilakukan oleh audit internal.

# Wewenang Komite Audit

Komite Audit memiliki wewenang untuk meldakses setiap dan semua dokumen, data dan informasi serta catatan yang berkaitan dengan karyawan, Dana, aset, dan sumber daya Perusahaan lainnya,agar dapat menjalankan tugasnya secara efektif.Selain itu, Komite Audit juga berwenang untuk Berkumunikasi langsung dengan karyawan mana pun, jika perlu, dan memperoleh bantuan eksternal, jika diperlukan.

# Competency Development for Audit Committee Members

In order to carry out their responsibilities effectively, members of the Audit Committee are expected to always be aware of the latest developments in matters related to their functions. The Company did not conduct any special training or competency development for Audit Committee members during 2023.

# Audit Committee Charter

The Audit Committee Charter, which was adopted on June 29, 2016, specifies the duties, responsibilities and authority of the Audit Committee. The Charter can be seen on the Company's website, www.jayaproperty.com.

The Audit Committee Charter covers the following topics:

1. Regulatory Basis;  
2. Purpose;  
3. Composition, Structure and Membership;  
4. Membership Requirements and Term of Office;  
5. Duties, Responsibilities and Authority;  
6. Working Procedures;  
7. Meeting Policy;  
8. Reporting.

# Audit Committee Duties and Responsibilities

The Audit Committee's duties and responsibilities, as described in the Charter, are to:

Review the financial information disclosed by the Company;  
Make recommendations to the Board of Commissioners on the appointment or reappointment of the external auditor;  
- Review the Company's compliance with capital market laws and other relevant regulations;  
- Ensure the confidentiality of corporate documents, data and information;  
- Review and evaluate the audits performed by the internal audit unit.

# Audit Committee Authority

The Audit Committee has the authority to access any and all documents, data and information and records relating to the Company's employees, funds, assets and other resources, in the course of effectively executing its duties. In addition, the Committee is authorized to communicate directly with any of the employees, if necessary, and to seek external assistance if required.

# Rapat Komite Audit

Komite Audit tersebutakan rapat paling sedikit sekali setiap tiga bulan, sebagai mania disyaratkan oleh Piagam Komite Audit dan Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015. Untuk mencapai kuorum, setup rapat harus dihadiri lebih dari  $50 \%$  dari jumlah anggota, dan risalah rapat harus dilaporkan kepada Dewan Komisaris.

Komite Audit entwickan 5 kali rapat pada tahun 2023 dan 1 kali rapat bersama Unit Audit Internal, dengan tingkat kehadiran  $100\%$ .

# Audit Committee Meetings

The Audit Committee meets at least once every quarter, as required by the Audit Committee Charter and OJK Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015. To reach a quorum, each meeting should be attended by more than  $50\%$  of the members, and the minutes of every meeting must be reported to the Board of Commissioners.

The Audit Committee held 5 meetings in 2023 and 1 meeting with the Internal Audit Unit, with an attendance rate of  $100\%$ .

# Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Nomination and Remuneration Function

Fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi dijalkan oleh Dewan Komisaris. Oleh karena itu, Perusahaan tidak memiliki Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi tersendiri. Dewan Komisaris Perusahaan bertindak independen dalam menjalankan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi.

Dalam menjalankan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi, Dewan Komisaris memiliki Pedoman Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi. Pedoman Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi, yang disahkan pada tanggal 3 Januari 2017, mengatur tugas, tanggung jawab, dan wewenang Dewan Komisaris yang menjalankan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi. Pedoman tersebut dapat dilihat di situs web Perusahaan, www.jayaproperty.com.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Dewan Komisaris dalam Menjalankan Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan Fungsi Nominasi, sebagai mana dijelaskan dalam Pedoman, adalah sebagai berikut:

- Mengatur komposisi jabatan anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Mengatur kebijakan dan kriteria yang dibutuhkan dalam proses Nominasi;  
- Mengatur kebijakan evaluasi kinerja bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Melakukan penilaian kinerja anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris berdasarkan tolok ukur yang telah disusun sebagai bahan evaluasi;  
- Mengatur program pengembangan kemampuan anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Mengusulkan calon yang memenuhi syarat sebagai anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris untuk disampaikan kepada RUPS.

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan Fungsi Remunerasi, sebagaimana dijelaskan dalam Pedoman, adalah sebagai berikut:

- Menyusun struktur Remunerasi bagi anggota Direksi dan/ ata anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Menyusun kebijakan atas Remunerasi bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;

The nomination and remuneration functions are performed by the Board of Commissioners. The Company therefore does not have a separate Nomination and Remuneration Committee. The Company's Board of Commissioners acts independently in carrying out the nomination and remuneration function.

In carrying out the nomination and remuneration function, the Board of Commissioners has the Nomination and Remuneration Function Manual (charter). The Nomination and Remuneration Function Charter, approved on January 3, 2017, stipulates the duties, responsibilities and authorities of the Board of Commissioners performing the nomination and remuneration function. The charter can be viewed on the Company's website, www.jayaproperty.com.

# Duties and Responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners in Carrying Out the Nomination and Remuneration Function

The duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners in carrying out the Nomination Function, as described in the charter, are as follows:

Regulate the composition of positions for members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners;  
- Set the policies and criteria required in the Nomination process;  
- Set the performance evaluation policy for members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners;  
Conducting performance assessments of members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners based on benchmarks that have been prepared as evaluation materials;  
- Arrange capacity building programs for members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners;  
- Propose qualified candidates as members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners to be submitted to the GMS.

The duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners in carrying out the Remuneration Function, as described in the Guidelines, are as follows:

Develop a Remuneration structure for members of the Board of Directors and / or members of the Board of Commissioners;  
- Formulate policies on Remuneration for members of the Board of Directors and / or members of the Board of Commissioners;

The Board of Commissioners, in carrying out its Nomination and Remuneration function, held 4 meetings in 2023, with  $100\%$  attendance rate.

# Sekretaris Perusahaan

Corporate Secretary

Sekretaris Perusahaan merupakan penghubung utama antara Perusahaan dengan pemangku kepentaning eksternalseperti Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK), Bursa Efek Indonesia, Pusat Pelaporan dan Analisis Transaksi Keuangan (PPATK), dan penasihat hukum Perusahaan, Pemegang Saham, komunitas investor, akuntan eksternal, juru taksir, analis dan masyarakat umum. Sekretaris Perusahaan memastikan semua laporan yang diperlukan telah diserahkan kepada otoritas keuangan terkait. Beliau juga mengawasi pengungkapan informasi yang lenghtkap, akurat dan tersebut waktu mengenai aksi korporasi Perusahaan, kinerja keuangan, dan hal-hal lain yang relevan dengan Pemegang Saham dan pemangku kepentingan. Kinerja Sekretaris Perusahaan dievaluasi oleh Direksi setiap tahun.

# Profil Sekretaris Perusahaan

The Corporate Secretary is the principal liaison between the Company and its external stakeholders such as the Financial Services Authority (OJK), the Indonesia Stock Exchange, the Indonesian Financial Transaction Reports and Analysis Center (PPATK), and the Company's legal counsel, shareholders, the investor community, external accountants, appraisers, analysts and the general public. The Corporate Secretary ensures that all required reports and other documentation are submitted to the relevant financial authorities. She also oversees the disclosure of comprehensive, accurate and timely information about the Company's corporate actions, financial performance, and other relevant matters to our shareholders and stakeholders. The Corporate Secretary's performance is evaluated by BoD every year.

- Membuat Laporan Tahunan Perusahaan;

Sebagai penghubung antara Perusahaan dengan pemegang saham Perusahaan, Otoritas Jasa Keuangan, dan pemangku kepada tingan lainnya;

# Duties and Responsibilities of Corporate Secretary

The duties and responsibilities of the Corporate Secretary, as set forth in the Company's Articles of Association and OJK Regulation No. 35/POJK.04/2014, are as follows:

- Keep up with developments in the Capital Market, especially the prevailing laws and regulations in the Capital Market and monitor the Company's compliance with the Company Law and other laws and regulations, the Articles of Association, as well as OJK and IDX regulations, and coordinate with the Legal Department in connection with corporate actions;  
- Provide input to the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of the Company to comply with the provisions of laws and regulations in the Capital Market;  
- Maintaining all corporate documents, including minutes of Shareholders Meetings, and minutes of Board of Commissioners' and Board of Directors' meetings;  
Assisting the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners in the implementation of corporate governance which includes:

> Disclosure of information to the public, including the availability of information on the Company's Website;  
» Submission of reports to the Financial Services Authority, Indonesia Stock Exchange, Bank Indonesia, and INTRAC on time as required;  
Organization and documentation of the General Meeting of Shareholders;  
Organization and documentation of Board of Directors meetings and Board of Commissioners meetings;  
Implementation of company orientation program for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners.  
» Considering the composition of members of the Board of Commissioners, Board of Directors, Audit Committee, and Internal Audit Unit to always fulfill the requirements as stipulated in the Financial Services Authority Regulation.

Prepare the Company's Annual Report;  
Prepare the Company's Sustainability Report;  
As a liaison between the Company and the Company's shareholders, the Financial Services Authority, and other stakeholders;  
- Ensure that Shareholders, media, investors, analysts and public are appropriately and regularly informed of the Company's actions, financial position and other material matters.  
- Maintain and update the material on the Company's Website so that it always meets the requirements as stipulated in POJK No. 8/POJK.04/2015 and other OJK and IDX Regulations regarding information disclosure to publics.

# Evaluasi Efektivitas Pengendalian Internal
pada Tahun 2023

Untuk menilai efektivitas proses dan pengendalian operasional dan keuangan internal Perusahaan, Audit Internal dan Komite Audit melakukan serangkaian audit dan pengujian{serta mencampaukan temuan dan rekomendasi mereka kepada Direktur Utama dan Dewan Komisaris. Berdasarkan temuan tersebut, Manajemen说我mpulkan oleh pengendalian internal sudah memadai untuk ruang lingkup dan skala bisnis secara berfungsi secara efektif.

Kepatuhan kami terhadap standar ISO 9001:2015 ditinjau dualaki dalam setahun oleh Tim MR ISO Perusahaanserta audit eksternal setup tahun.

The Company's internal control system is designed to provide reasonable assurance over financial and operational controls, risk management, and compliance with laws and regulations. This enables the Company to detect and correct weaknesses promptly and thereby helps reduce the risk of failure to achieve the Company's objectives.

The internal control framework comprises all the mechanisms, standards and procedures we deploy to ensure the integrity of financial information, ensure accountability and prevent fraud. This includes our corporate governance framework, Code of Conduct, control activities and information and communication systems. It also incorporates our quality management system, which is certified to ISO 9001:2015 standard, indicating that the Company complies with international best practices on quality management.

The internal control system is supervised and evaluated by the Internal Audit, which reports its findings to the President Director and recommends remedial actions if any deficiencies are found. The Company's internal audit practices conform to the internally accepted standards issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (COSO).

The Audit Committee is a significant component of the internal control due to its oversight of financial and operational aspects, particularly in relation to the use of prudential principles in the preparation and presentation of financial statements and in managing risks.

# Evaluation of Internal Control Effectiveness in 2023

To assess the effectiveness of the Company's internal financial and operational processes and controls, the Internal Audit and the Audit Committee performed a series of audits and tests and submitted their findings and recommendations to the President Director and the Board of Commissioners. Based on the findings, Management has concluded that the internal controls are adequate for the current scope and scale of the business and are functioning effectively.

Our ISO 9001:2015 compliance undergoes twice-yearly reviews by the Company's ISO MR Team as well as an external quality audit every year.

# Gambaran Umum

Kelangsungan dan pertumbuhan bisnis kami dalam jangka panjang sebagian bergantung pada kemampuan kami untuk mengidentifikasi dan mengelola risiko secara efektif, baik secara internal maupun eksternal, yang dapat berdampak negatif terhadap kinerja, keuangandan reputasi Perusahaan. Oleh karena itu,SYSTEM manajemen risiko kami dirancang untuk mendeteksi dan memantau risiko yang munculserta mereka pemungkan dan potensi dampaknya. Kami kemudian mengembangkan strategi dan tindakan mitigasi yang telah berdasarkan selera risiko Perusahaan, akan tingkat risiko yang dapat diterima. Profil risiko Perusahaan ditinja dan diperbarui secara berkala.

Manajemen memiliki tanggung jawab keseluruhan atas manajemen risiko. Namun, sejalan dengan budaya risiko di seluruh Perusahaan, setiap unit bisnis bertanggung jawab untuk mengidentifikasi dan mengelola risiko seksuai dengan kewenangannya masing-masing.

# Jenis Risiko dan Cara Pengelolaannya

Risiko utama yang secara material dapat berdampak pada kinerja Perusahaan, dan tindakan mitigasi terkait yang telah kami lakukan, dijelaskan di bawah ini.

# Overview

The continuity and growth of our business over the long term depends in part on our ability to effectively identify and manage risks, both internal and external, that could negatively impact the Company's performance, financial viability and reputation. Our risk management system is therefore designed to detect and monitor emerging risks and assess their probability and potential impact. We then develop appropriate mitigation strategies and actions based on the Company's risk appetite, or level of acceptable risk. The Company's risk profile is regularly reviewed and updated.

The Management has overall responsibility for risk management. However, in line with our Company-wide risk culture, each business unit is responsible for identifying and managing local risks in accordance with their authority.

# Types of Risks and How to Address Them

The key risks that could materially impact the Company's performance, and the associated mitigation measures we have put in place, are described below.

Untuk meminimalisir hal tersebut, kami mensyaratkan kepada konsumen untuk melakulkan pembayaran tunai kepada makeli KPR. # Kode Etik

# Code of Conduct

Kode Etik kami memberikan kerangka kerja untuk mencapkan prinsip-prinsip tata kelola perusahaan yang baik dalam bisnis kami sehari-hari. Semua karyawan diharapkan mematuhi dan mempraktikkan standar etika dan perilaku yang dijelaskan dalam Kode Etik untuk memastikan kita makukan bisnis dengan integritas, keadilan, dan transparansi. Kami meyakini penegakan Kode Etik dan pengerapan sanksi untuk setiap pelanggaran dengan secara konsisten akan membrantu memastikan Bahwa hak dan kepentingan pemangku kepentingan kami dilindungi, sejalan dengan nilai-nilai kami.

Our Code of Conduct offers a framework for implementing the of principles good corporate governance in our day-to-day business. All employees are expected to abide by and practice the ethical standards and behaviors described in the Code in order to ensure that we do business with integrity, fairness and transparency. We believe that by upholding the Code consistently, and enforcing sanctions for any Code violations, we protect the rights and interests of our stakeholders in accordance with our corporate values.

# Bentuk Sosialisasi Kode Etik dan Upaya Penegakannya

Karyawanbaru akan menerima orientasi atas Kode Etik dan nilai-nilai perusahaan selama masa pengenalan, dan diberikan salinan panduan Kode Etik. Berbagai aspek Kode Etik diperkuat secara Berkala melaluiRAPAT internal, pertemuan, dan sesi pelatihan.

Kepatuhan terhadap tata laku dievaluasi oleh Audit Internal-Sebagai bagian dari proses audit rutinnya. Di tingkat individu, kepadahan ditinja melalui evaluasi kinerja tahunan karyawan, yang dinilai berdasarkan Key Behavior Indicators yang mengacu pada Kode Etik.

Dugaan pelanggaran Kode Etik dapat dilaporkan ke Komite Etika Grup Jaya untuk ditinjau. Jika laporan tersebut terbukti, Perusahaan dapat menjatuhkan sanksi yang seksuai dengan tingkat kepada dan dampak dari kasus tersebut, seksuai dengan hukum dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku.

# Penerapan Kode Etik di Seluruh Perusahaan

Kode Etik berlaku anggota Direksi, anggota Dewan Komisaris, dan seluruh karyawan Perusahaan.

# Code of Conduct Socialization and its Implementation Efforts

New employees receive an orientation to the Code of Conduct and the corporate values during their induction, and are given a copy of the Code manual. Various aspects of the Code of Conduct are periodically reinforced through internal meetings, gatherings and training sessions.

Code compliance is evaluated by the Internal Audit as part of its routine audit process. At the individual level, compliance is reviewed through employees' annual performance evaluations, during which they are assessed on Key Behavior Indicator that are based on the Code of Conduct.

Suspected violations of the Code of Conduct may be reported to the Jaya Group's Ethics Committee for review. If the report is substantiated, the Company may impose sanctions commensurate with the severity and impact of the case, in accordance with the prevailing laws and regulations.

# Company-wide Application of the Code of Conduct

The Code of Conduct applies to members of the Board of Directors, members of the Board of Commissioners, and all employees of the Company.

# Kebijakan Pemberian Kompensasi Jangka Panjang Berbasis Kinerja Kepada Manajemen dan Karyawan

Policy of Providing Performance-Based Long-Term Compensation to Management and Employees

Perusahaan belum memiliki program Management Stock Ownership Program (MSOP) dan Employee Stock Ownership Program (ESOP).

The Company does not have Management Stock Ownership Program (MSOP) and Employee Stock Ownership Program (ESOP).

# Kebijakan Pengungkapan Informasi atas Kepemilikan Saham Anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Policy on Disclosure of Information on Share Ownership of Members of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

Sesuai dengan Pedoman Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Perusahaan, anggota Direksi dan anggota Dewan Komisaris wajib menyampaikan informasi kepada Perusahaan mengenai kepemilikan dan setiap perubahan kepemilikannya atas saham Perusahaan. Penyampaian informasi tersebut dilakukan paling lambat 3 (tiga) hari kerja setelah terjadinya kepemilikan untuk setiap perubahan kepemilikan atas saham Perusahaan.

Seluruh anggota Direksi dan anggota Dewan Komisaris telah melaporkan kepada Perusahaan mengenai kepemilikan dan setiap perubahan kepemilikannya atas saham Perusahaan tersebut waktu selama tahun 2023.

In accordance with the Company's Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners Charter, members of the Board of Directors and members of the Board of Commissioners are required to submit information to the Company regarding their ownership and any changes in their ownership of the Company's shares. The submission of such information shall be made no later than 3 (three) business days after the occurrence of ownership or any change in ownership of the Company's shares.

All members of the Board of Directors and members of the Board of Commissioners have reported to the Company regarding ownership and any changes in their ownership of the Company's shares on time during 2023.

# Sistem Pelaporan Pelanggaran

Whistleblowing System

Sistem Pelaporan Pelanggaran dirancang untuk memastikan setiap pihak yang bertindak secara illegal kepada tidak pantas dengan melanggar Kode Etik kami dapat dimintai pertanggungjawaban seraya melindungi orang-orang yang terkena dampak kepada melaporkan pelanggaran tersebut.

# Cara Penyampaian Laporan Pelanggaran

Kami mendorong karyawan untuk melaporkan jikamereka mengalami, menjadi sakan, kepada mencurigai adanya pelanggaran di dalam Perusahaan dengan melaporkannya kepada atas langsung mereka. Mereka juga memiliki pilihan untuk melapor langsung kepada Unit Audit Internal atau ke Manager SDM.

# Perlindungan bagi Pelapor

Kami memastikan tidak akan ada tindakan balas dendam terhadap siapa pun yang melaporkan potensi pelanggaran dengan menjaga kerahasiaan identitas mereka. Karyawan dapat melaporkan secara anomim jika menginginkannya.

# Penanganan Pengaduan

Laporan yang masuk akan dievaluasi oleh tim investigasi. Jika tutuhan tersebut terbukti, Perusahaan dapat menjatuhkan sanksi kepada orang atas orang-orang yang bersangkutan dan/atau membuat penesuaian untuk memastikan agar hal tersebut tidak terulang kembali.

# Pihak yang Mengelola Pengaduan

Sistem Pelaporan Pelanggaran dikelolaleh Internal Audit, SDM dan Komite Etik Grup Jaya.

# Laporan Pelanggaran pada Tahun 2023

Tidak ada kasus yang dilaporkan oleh diproses melaluisystem Pelaporan Pelanggaran pada tahun 2023.

# Sanksi

Sanksi disipliner hijatuhkan, sesuai dengan kebijakan Perusahaan, dengan mempertimbangkan tingkat kepada dan dampak pelanggaran tersebut. Sanksi dapat berkitas dari peringatan lisan tingga dan termasuk skorsing, penurunan pangkat, pemotongan gaji, dan pemecatan.

Perusahaan tidak menjadikan sanksi disipliner apa pun pada tahun 2023.

The whistleblowing system is designed to ensure that any parties who act illegally or inappropriately in breach of our Code of Conduct can be held accountable while safeguarding those who are impacted by or report such misconduct.

# Reporting Procedure

We strongly encourage employees to speak up if they experience, witness or suspect misconduct within the Company by reporting it to their line manager. They also have the option of reporting directly to the Internal Audit Unit or to the HRD Manager.

# Protection for Whistleblowers

We ensure that there will be no retaliation against anyone who reports potential misconduct by keeping their identity strictly confidential. Employees may report anonymously if they prefer to.

# Whistleblower Report Handling

Incoming reports are evaluated by an investigative team. If the allegation is substantiated, the Company may impose sanctions on the person or persons concerned and/or make changes to ensure that it does not happen again.

# Whistleblowing System Manager

The whistleblowing system is managed by the Internal Audit, HRD and the Jaya Group Ethics Committee.

# Whistleblowing Reports in 2023

No cases were reported or processed through the whistleblowering system in 2023.

# Sanctions

Disciplinary sanctions are imposed, in accordance with Company policy, by taking into account the severity and impact of the violation. Sanctions may range from verbal warnings up to and including suspension, demotion, salary deduction and dismissal.

The Company did not impose any disciplinary sanctions in 2023.

Sebagian beschriebekijakan anti-korupsi kami dituangkan dalam Kode Etik, yang mencakup konflik kepentingan; anti-suap;;pereimaan hadiah dan bentuk keramahtamahan;menyimpan catatan yang akurat; pelaporan dan akuntansi; dan melindungi asset fisik dan keuangan{serta kekayaanintelektual Perusahaan. Unit Audit Internal secara rutin suchen auditit unit dan proses bisnis kami untuk memastikan bisnis kami dijalankan secara legal dan seksuai dengan prinsip-prinsip tata kelola perusahan yang baik.
