# Programs and Procedures Implemented to Address Corruption, Kickbacks, Fraud, Bribery, and Gratisities

Most of our anti-corruption policies are incorporated in the Code of Conduct, which covers conflicts of interest; antibribery; gifts and hospitality; keeping accurate records; reporting and accounting; and protecting the Company's physical and financial assets and intellectual property. Our policies on contractor and vendor selection state that a transparent tender process must be used. In addition, we do not accept cash payments for our products.

The Internal Audit Unit regularly audits our business units and processes to ensure that our business is conducted legally and in accordance with good corporate governance principles. Our MR ISO Unit and the external quality assessment body (URS), provide further defense against corruption.

# Anti-Corruption Socialization in 2023

The Company has socialized our anti-corruption policy to all employees by 2023 (especially new employees).

# Budaya Perusahaan

Corporate Culture

Perusahaan telah mengidentifikasi lima nilai yang tertanam di seluruh organisasi dan dalam semua tindakan dan interaksi kami dengan orang lain. Nilai-nilai tersebut but memberikan landasan untuk makukanan bisnis secara berkelanjutan dan dengan integritas dengan cara yang menciptakan nilai bagi semua pemangku kepentingan kami. Nilai-nilai tersebut, yang dijelaskan dalam panduan Kode Etik, mewakili budaya perusahaan kami.

# 1. Integritas

Bersikap jujur dan konsisten menunjukkan perilaku yang etis dan bermoral dengan cara:

- Menempatkan kepentingan Perseroan di atas kepentingan pribadi;  
- Menghindari benturan kepentingan;  
- Tidak terlibat dalam sikap yang negatif dan berkelakuan buruk;  
- Tidak mengambil kesempatan untuk memperoleh keuntungan bagi diri sendiri ata relasi-relasinya.

# 2. Kewajaran

Bertindak wajar dan bermartabat:

Memberikan kesempatan dan perilakuan yang setara kepada seluruh kandidat dalam hal rekrutmen oleh promosi;  
- Tidak memberi tugas-tugas yang melampaui kapabilitas dan tanggung jawab seseorang;  
- Menilai mencapaian dan mempromosikan karyawan berdasarkan kinerja bukanya berdasarkan hubungan kekeluargaan;  
Memberikan hukuman atas kesalahan-kesalahan secara tetas dan penuh pertimbangan.

# 3. Komitmen

Menepati janji, dapat diandalkan, dan berdedikasi;penh dalam melaksanakan:

- Komitmen terhadap (eksternal) pelanggan atas jadwal, kualitas dan biaya pekerjaan sebagaimana tertulis di dalam kontrak;  
- Komitmen terhadap subkontraktor/pemasok untuk makukan pembayaran tepat waktu;  
- Komitmen untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan (pelanggan internal).

The Company has identified five values that are embedded across the organization and in all our actions and interactions with others. They provide the foundation for doing business sustainably and with integrity in a way that creates value for all our stakeholders. The values, which are explained in the Code of Conduct manual, represent our corporate culture.

# 1. Integrity

Being honest and consistently displaying ethical and moral behavior by:

- Putting the interests of the Company above personal interests;  
Avoiding conflicts of interest;  
Not engaging in negative attitudes and misconduct;  
Not taking the opportunity to benefit themselves or their relatives.

# 2. Fairness

Acting fairly and with dignity:

Providing opportunities and equal treatment to all candidates with regard to recruitment or promotion;  
- Not assigning tasks that exceed the person's capabilities and responsibilities;  
Assessing achievements and promoting employees based on performance instead of familiarity;  
Giving penalties for errors firmly yet considerably.

# 3. Commitment

Keeping promises, being reliable and fully dedicated in fulfilling:

- Commitments to (external) customers on schedule, with the quality and cost of the work as stated in the contract;  
- Commitments to sub-contractors/supplier to make payments on time;  
- Commitments to complete tasks (internal customers).

# 4. Disiplin

Konsisten dengan tujuan, strategi, dan kebikan:

- Melakukan pekerjaan seksuai dengan tugas dan tanggung jawab;  
- Tidak menyimpang darijisena jasa,targetasar,dan bisnis yang ditetapkan oleh Perseroan;  
- Tidak mencimpang dari parameter/kendala yang diperbolehkan oleh Perseroan.

# 5. Motivasi

Keinginan untuk melakukan pekerjaan berdasarkan dorongan untuk mencapai yang terbaik dalam hal:

Kepuasan pelanggan;  
- Bertahan di tengah berbagai hambatan.

# 4. Discipline

Consistent with the objectives, strategies and policies:

- Carrying out work in accordance with duties and responsibilities;  
Not deviating from the type of service, target market and the business established by the Company;  
Not deviating from parameters/constraints that have been granted by the Company.

# 5. Motivation

The impulse to do a job is based on the drive to achieve the best:

- Customer satisfaction;  
To persist in the midst of obstacles.

Perusaanan Terbuka memiliki cara ata prosedur teknis pengumpulan suara (voting) baik secara terbuka maupun tertutup yang mengedepankan independensi, dan kepentingan pemegang saham.

Public companies have a method or procedure for voting, whether open or closed, that protects the independence and the interests of the shareholders.

1. Setiap saham dengan hak suara yang dikeluarkan mempunyaiantu hak suara (one share one vote). Pemegang saham dapat meng gunakan hak suranya pada saat pengambilan keputusan, terutama dalam pengambilan keputusan dengan cara pengumpulan suara (voting). Namun demikian, mekanisme pengambilan keputusan dengan cara pengumpulan suara (voting) baik secara terbuka maupun tertutupbelum diatur secara rinci.  
1. Every share with voting rights has one vote (one share, one vote). Shareholders can use their vote when decisions are taken, specifically decisions that are taken by voting. However, whether voting is open or closed is not specified in detail.

2. Perusahaan Terbuka direkomendasikan mempunyai prosedur pengambilan secara dalam pengambilan keputusan atas suatu mata acara RUPS.

Adapun prosedur pengambilan suara (voting) tersebut harus menjaga independensi ataupun kebebasan pemegang saham. Sebagai contoh, dalam pengumpulan suara (voting) secara terbuka dilakukan dengan cara menggangkat tangan sesuai dengan instruksi pilihan yang ditawarkan oleh pimpinan RUPS. Sedangkan, dalam pengumpulan suara (voting) secara tertutup dilakukan pada keputusan yang membutuhkan kerahasiaan ataupun atas permintaan pemegang saham, dengan cara seksungan kartu suara ataupun dengan penggunaan electronic voting.

Ya

Sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan Pasal 11, setup saham memberikan hak kepada pemiliknya untuk mengeluarkan 1 (satu) suara.

Yes

In accordance with Article 11 of the Company's Articles of Association, every issued share with voting rights has one vote (one share one vote).

Ya

Tata cara teknis pengumpulan suara telah tercantum dalam Peraturan Tata Tertib Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham yang akan di distribusikan sebelum Rapat berlangsung. Dalam tata cara tertulis karena Pada setiap acara, Pimpinan Rapat akan memberi kesempatan kepada Pemegang Saham untuk Kuasa mereka yang sah untuk mengajukan pertanyaan-pertanyaan dan/atau menjadi pendapat yang berhubungan dengan mata acara Rapat yang dibicarakan dan/atau pendapat untuk setiap mata acara Rapat. Bagi pemegang saham yang hadir fisik dapat mencampaikan tanggapan/pertanyaan dengan menggangkat tangan dan meminta kepada petugas formulir pertanyaan untuk diisi. Adapun bagi pemegang saham yang hadir secara elektronik dapat mencampaikan tanggapan/ pertanyaan melalui fitur chat dalam system eASY. KSEI. Pengambilan keputusan akan dilakukan setelah seluruh pertanyaan sebelum dijawab dan/atau waktuanya jawab habis.

# Prinsip 4

Meningkatkan Kualitas Pelaksanaan Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Dewan Komisaris.

Principle 4

Strengthen the quality of execution of the Board of Commissioners' duties and responsibilities.

4.1

Dewan Komisaris  
mempunjay kebijakan  
penilaian sendiri (Self Assessment) untuk  
menilai kinerja Dewan Komisaris.

Kebijakan penilaian sendiri (Self Assessment) Dewan Komisaris merupakan suatu pedoman yang digunakan sebagai;bentuk akuntabilitas atas penilaian kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara kolegial. Self Assessment untuk penilaian sendiri dimaksud dilakukan oleh masing-masing anggota untuk tidak memilai pelaksanaan kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara kolegial, dan bukan mereka melilai kinerja individual masingmasing anggota Dewan Komisaris. Dengan adanya Self Assessment ini diharapkan masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dapat berkontribusi untuk memperbaiki kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara berkesinambungan. Dalam kebijingan tersebut dapat mencakup kegiatan penilaian yang dilakukan beserta maksud dan tujuannya, waktu pelaksanaannya secara Berkala, dan tidak ukur untuk kriteria penilaian yang digunakan sesuai dengan dengan rekomendasi yang diberikan oleh fungsi Remunerasi dan Nominasi Perusahaan Terbuka, dimana adanya fungsi tersebut telah diwajibkan dalam Peraturan OJKtentang Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi Emiten untuk Perusahaan Publik.

Ya

Dewan Komisaris Perusahaan memiliki kebijakan penilaian sendiri (self assessment) secara kolejial paling kurang 1 kali dalam setahun.

Pada tahun 2023, Dewan Komisaris melaksanan 1 kali self assessment secara kolegial.

# Prinsip 5

Memperkuat Keanggotaan dan Komposisi Direksi

Principle 5

Strengthen the membership and composition of the Board of Directors

# Laporan Keberlanjutan

Sustainability Report

# Strategi Keberlanjutan

Sustainability Strategy

![](images/2320d3d7aef3105d8a1e588a4db834e1f7dc43dc7ec2397d2b0b2f862d8d4d5b.jpg)

Perusahaan bergkomitmen untuk menghasilan pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan dan memberikan dampak positif bagi kesejahteraan sosial dan ekonomi masyarakat ada tingkungan.

Prinsip keberlanjutan telah tertanam dalam model bisnis Perseroan. Kami percaya bahwa pendekatan keberlanjutan merupakan cara terbaik untuk mencapai dan mempertahankan kelangsungan usaha. Kami menghargai sustainability sebagai sarana untuk mencapai tujuan dalam menciptakan dan memaksimalkan nilai tambah bagi seluruh pemangku kepentingan, dari aspek ekonomi, sosial, dan lingkungan. Pada saat yang bersamaan, kami berupaya untuk mengurangi dampak negatif dari Produk dan operasi bisnis kami.

Strategi keberlanjutan Perusahaan mencakup empat aspek yaitu: Lingkungan; Praktik Ketenagakerjaan, Kesehatan dan Keselamatan di Tempat Kerja; Barang dan Jasa; dan Pengembangan Sosial dan Masyarakat.

1. Strategi Keberlanjutan pada Lingkungan:

a. Mengurangi pemakaian energia yang tidak efisien melalui fitur desain yang ramah lingkungan.  
b. Mematuhi seksu tetentuan peraturan yang berlaku dan standar berkelanjutan.  
c. Mengembangkan fasilitas transportasi umum pada area pengembangan, untuk meminimalkan emisi karbon yang dihasilan dari kendaran yang digunakan untuk mengangkut manusia dan Barang.

The Company is committed to generating sustainable growth and create a positive impact on the social and economic welfare of the community and the environment.

Sustainability is embedded into the Company's business model. We believe that a sustainability approach is the best way to achieve and maintain business continuity. We value sustainability as a means to achieve the purpose of creating and maximizing added value to all stakeholders, as seen from the economic, social and environmental dimensions. At the same time, we strive to reduce the negative impacts of our products and business operations.

The Company's sustainability strategy consists of four aspects: Environment; Labor Practices, Health and Safety in the Workplace; Goods and Services; and Social and Community Development.

1. Sustainability Strategies in Environment :

a. To reduce energy waste through green design feature.  
b. Compliance to all related regulatory requirements and green standards.  
c. Developing public transport facilities in the development area, to minimize carbon emissions generated from vehicles used to transport people and goods.

d. Membantu mengurangi perubahan iklim dan pelestarian lingkungan melalui program-programseperti penananan pohon, ruang terbuka hijau, biopori, jalur sepeda dan pejalan kaki,erta transportasi umum.  
e. Melaksanakan program pengelolaan limbah yang bertanggung jawab.

2. Strategi Keberlanjutan dalam Praktik Ketenagakerjaan, Kesehatan dan Keselamatan di Tempat Kerja:

a. Memiliki struktur organisi keberlanjutan yang terdiri dari manajemen senior, manajemen menengah, dan karyawan dari berbagai fungsi yang bertanggung jawab untuk mengawasi setiap aspeki lingkungan, sosial dan ekonomi Perusahaan,<serta mengkaji dan memetakan masalah dan risiko keberlanjutan di dalam Perusahaan.  
b. Menyediakan program kesehatan bagi karyawan kami.  
c. Memberikan remunerasi kepada karyawan secara layak dan kompetitif sebagai pengakuan atas dedikasi, kesetiaan, dan kinerjanya.  
d. Selain gajiPokokmereka,karyawan menerima bonus berdasarkan kinerja, yang dihitung bagiungakan rumus yang disepadaki pada awal setiap tahun.  
e. Menghormati keberagaman, menolak diskriminasi atas dasarjis kelamin atau latar belakang, dan memberi akses yang setara dalam mengembangkan karier di Perusahaan, di mana semua keputusan yang kerkait remunerasi, promosi dan pelatihan didasari pada prestasi dan tujuan strategis Perusahaan.  
f. Mewajibkan semua kontraktor, vendor, dan mitra bisnis lain yang bekerja atas name Perusahaan untuk memiliki sertifikasi kesehatan dan keselamatan kerja yang berlaku dan mematuhi standar dan prosedur kesehatan dan keselamatan Perusahaan.

3. Keberlanjutan dalam Pelibatan Pemangku Kepentingan (terkait Barang dan Jasa):

a. Melibatkan pemangku kepentingan dalam meninjaumasalah keberlanjutan kami melalui berbagai pendekatan speerti forum diskusi kelompok (FGD),survey kepada orang dan penyewa,erta survei kepuasan karyawan.  
b. Memastikan kualitas dan keamanan Produk kami bagi para konsumen.  
c. Perusahaan memberikan akses informasi secara komprehensif ingin Produkt kami, peluncuran Produkbaru, penawaran dan promosi langsung dari tim pemasaran kami yang telah terlatih dan melalui saluran media sosial dan situs web kami.

4. Strategi Keberlanjutan dalam Pembangunan Sosial dan Kemasyarakatan:

a. Meningkatkan kesejahteraan dan kemakmuran karyawan dan masyarakat sekitar dengan mencatkan pendidikan mereka melalui program bebasiswa dan donasi, seda dengan membangun dan mencatkan sarana dan prasarana umum.  
b. Memprioritaskan masyarakat setempat untuk bekerja di Perusahaan kami.

d. Assist in climate change mitigation and environmental conservation through programmes such as tree planting, green open spaces, biopores, bicycle and pedestrian paths, and public transport  
e. To implement responsible waste management program.

2. Sustainability Strategies in Employment Practices, Health, and Workplace Safety."

a. We have a sustainability organization structure consisting of senior management, middle management and employees from various functions responsible for overseeing each of the Company's environmental, social and economic dimensions, as well as reviewing and mapping sustainability issues and risks within the Company.  
b. To provide health programs for our employees.  
c. Remunerate our employees appropriately and competitively in recognition of their dedication, loyalty and performance.  
d. In addition to their basic salary, employees received performance related bonuses, and calculated using a formula agreed at the beginning of each year.  
e. Respecting diversity, to reject discrimination based on gender or background, and to provide equal access to opportunities to develop a career within the Company, with all decisions related to remuneration, promotion and training based on merit and the Company's strategic objectives.  
f. Requiring all contractors, vendors and other business partners who work on the Company's behalf to possess relevant occupational health and safety certification and to comply with the Company's health and safety standards and procedures.

3. Sustainability in Stakeholder Engagement (related to Goods and Services):

a. To engage stakeholders in reviewing our material sustainability issues through various approaches such as focus group discussions (FGD), customer and tenant satisfaction surveys, and employee engagement surveys.  
b. Ensuring the quality and safety of our products for our customers  
c. The Company give access to comprehensive information about our products, new launches, offers and promotions directly from our trained marketing teams and via our social media channels and website.

4. Sustainability Strategy in Social and Community Development:

a. To improve the wellbeing and prosperity of our employees and surrounding communities by improving their education through scholarship and donation programs, and by building and improving infrastructure and public facilities.  
b. To give priority to local residents to work in our Company.

# Ikhtisar Kinerja Sosial

Social Highlights

Perusahaan menciptakan nilai sosial yang positif dengan membrantu memenuhi telah kelutuhan dasar masyarakat, yaitu perumahan dengan tidak terjangkau dan berkelanjutan. Saat ini kami memperlugas pengembangan kami pada tahun 2023, kami juga berkontribusi dalam penyediaan infrastruktur publik, menciptakan peluang ekonomi dan menciptakan lapangan kerja, baik secara langsung maupun tidak langsung dengan Perusahaan kami. Kami menyediakan akses pendidikan Berkualitasagianyak oleh melalui pemberian beviswa dan dukungan ke sekolah-sekoloh setempat di wilayah Bintaro. Sebanyak 167 akan telah menterima bantuan pendidikan dari Perusahaan pada tahun 2023. Kami juga terus mendukung pengembangan literasi melalui perpustakaan anus, setidaknya 2.897 anus mengobaca buku di Rumah Baca pada tahun 2023. Perusahaan mencydikan program-program kesejahteraan karyawan jangka panjang dengan mengikutsertakan seluruh karyawannya dalam program pensiun yang dikelola oleh Dana Pensiun Pembangunan Jaya dan juga mendaftarkan karyawan dalam Program Dana Hari Tua dan Jaminan Pensiun yang diselenggarakan oleh BPJS Ketenagakerjaan. Perusahaan telah menghitung estimi liabilitas imbalan pascakerja sesuai dengan Omnibus Law No. 11/2020 untuk tahun 2022, liabilitas imbalan pascakerjayang diakui adalah sebesar Rp 30,9 miliar pada tahun 2023 dan Rp 30 miliar pada tahun 2022. The Company created positive social value by helping to meet one of society's basic needs, namely affordable, sustainable housing. # Commitment to sustainability

We are commited to be one of the best property developers and management in Indonesia. For us, this means enabling people and businesses to thrive by offering quality homes at prices people can afford, and building attractive healthy communities that create real value for people and the planet as well as for our bottom line. In this way we hope to play our part in Indonesia's transition to a more prosperous sustainable society.

Strong governance is critically important to operating a sustainable business. The Company is committed to strengthening oversight, accountability and fairness throughout the organization through a management structure that has defined responsibilities for the implementation of financial, environmental and social responsibility practices. This structure is underpinned by an integrated risk management system that is continually reviewed and expanded in line with the growth of our business and developments in our operating environment.

We built Aviary Park as a bird conservation center equipped with an attractive mini zoo in the middle of an area that combines aspects of green open space and environmental sustainability. As of 31 December 2023, the construction progress has reached  $98\%$ . Aviary Park is a family recreation center that has educational value to provide a space for the wider community to understand the importance of maintaining biodiversity for future generations and provide positive benefits to the environment and surrounding communities, as an effort to improve the ecosystem, such as planting 10,000 trees and 50,000 shrubs. Aviary Park will have a soft opening in the first quarter 2024.

One of our most important contributions to the community has been expanding access to public transportation and making it a more viable alternative to private vehicle use. As part of our transit-oriented development (TOD) concept, we have collaborated closely with the national rail operator to upgrade the two commuter rail stations in Bintaro Jaya, Stasiun Pondok Ranji dan Jurangmangu. In 2022 we completed the revitalization of Pondok Ranji Station. The construction of a tunnel connecting Jurangmangu Station and Bintaro Xchange Mall 2 has been completed in 2023. Furthermore, for passengers within the Bintaro area seeking access to Jurangmangu Station, we have implemented designated stops for the In-Trans Bintaro feeder bus service at Bintaro Xchange Mall 2. The station is now a key new hub in our multimode public transit system that links most of the Bintaro Jaya-Graha Raya area not only to the commuter rail services but also to feeder bus networks that serve the TransJakarta Busway and the MRT.

We also met our environmental targets for the year by ensuring that our construction projects conform to green building specifications. In addition to using sustainable materials, our budlings are also designed to be carbon-efficient by incorporating better insulation, optimized layouts and sun glass. These features have also been incorporated in our offices, and have helped to contribute, along with a series of energy-saving measures, to a continued reduction in electricity consumption on our premises.

One of the most critical environmental issues facing the greater Jakarta area is water scarcity, and we have made it our mission to address this by ensuring that our new developments in Bintaro Jaya are supplied with treated surface water from the municipal water company through our subsidiary, PT Jaya Mitra Sarana, to avoid depleting local groundwater resources.

Pendekatan kami akan tetap fokus untuk terus mencatkan nilai keseluruhan area pengembangan kami melalui peningkatan fasilitas, aksesibilitas, dan kualitas hidup penduduk dengan tetap menjaga keterjangkauan tidak. Kami akan terus menghasilan nilai yang berkelanjutan bagi kanyakan, peluangan, dan masyarakat dengan menciptakan lingkungan yang sehstat dan aman untuk hidup dan bekerja. # Addressing future challenges

Our approach will remain focused on continuously improving the overall value of our development areas by upgrading amenities, accessibility and quality of life for our residents while maintaining affordability. In 2024, the opening of the Double Tree by Hilton hotel at Bintaro Jaya Xchange and Aviary Park in the Bintaro Creative District, supported by the recent upgrading of the adjacent transit facilities, will consolidate the status of both sites as premier destinations in South Tangerang for recreation, edutainment and commerce.

Although 2024 is a general election year for Indonesia, with both the presidency and parliamentary seats being contested, the political climate is not expected to have a significant effect on the economy, based on the evidence

from prior election years. The key downside risks are largely external, resulting from ongoing geopolitical uncertainty and diminished global demand.

We will remain focused on improving our sustainability performance in the coming year. In our annual report we have set out our strategy for accelerating the revenue growth momentum we achieved in 2024. We will continue to generate sustainable value for our people, our customers and our communities by creating healthy, safe environments for living and working. We would like to express our appreciation to all our employees and partners for your support, and we look forward to continuing our sustainability journey with you in 2024.

# Tanggung jawab untuk Keberlanjutan

Praktik bisnis yang berkelanjutan adalah bagian dari operasional dan tujuan bisnis reguler kami, dengan demikian, tanggung jawab atas kebujakan keberlanjutan kami dan pengerapannya berada di tangan manajemen Perusahaan. Direksi bertanggung jawab mengembangkan strategi keberlanjutan, pengerapan keuangan berkelanjutan, mengevaluasi pelaksanaan dan hasilnya, seda memastikan agar Dewan Komisaris terus mendapatkan informasi tentang setiap perkembanganya. Dewan Komisaris bekerja sama dengan Komite Audit, Audit Internal, dan Unit MR ISO untuk mengawasi pengerapan prinsipprinsip keuanganan berkelanjutan dalam pelaporan keuangan Perusahaan, kepadahan, manajemen risiko dan manajemen mutu.

# Penilaian Risiko dalam Pelaksanaan Keberlanjutan

Perusahaan berupaya untuk mempercepat pertumbuhan bisnis sekalis mengatatkan nilai sosial yang positif dan mengurangi jejak lingkungganya. Untuk mencapai misi ini, kami harus mampu mengidentifikasi, mengelola, dan memitigasi secara efektif kisaran risiko yang dapat berdampak negatif terhadap kinerja, kemampuan keuangan dan reputasi kami. Oleh karena itu, kami telah mengembangkan pendekatan manajemen risiko yang systematis dan disiplin yang beroperasi di setiap level organisasi.

Sistem manajemen risiko, merupakan bagian dari kerangka pengendalian internal kami, ditinjau secara Berkala oleh Audit Internal, yang mencakup kepadauhan terhadap kebujakan anti-korupsi dan anti-peripuan Perusahaan. Audit Internal melaporkan temuan dan rekomendasi untuk ditindaklanjuti kepada Direksi.

Perincian lebih lanjut mengenai manajemen risiko selama periode pelaporan disajikan dalam Laporan Tahunan Perusahaan tahun 2023.

# Responsibility for Sustainability

Sustainable business practices are part of our regular business operations and objectives, and as such, responsibility for our sustainability policy and its implementation rests with the Company's senior management. The Board of Directors is responsible for developing sustainability strategies, implementation of sustainable finance, evaluating the execution and results, and keeping the Board of Commissioners abreast of any developments. The Board of Commissioners works with the Audit Committee, the Internal Audit and the MR ISO Unit to oversee the implementation of sustainable finance principles in the Company's financial reporting, compliance, risk management and quality management.

# Development of Competencies related to Sustainability

We continued to strengthen the capabilities of the personnel involved in implementing and overseeing key aspects of sustainability in 2023, as follows:

ISO 9001:2015 Awareness & Internal Auditor Training, attended by selected employees.  
- Sustainability report training held by the Indonesia Stock Exchange, attended by the Corporate Secretary.

# Risk Assessment on Sustainability Implementation

The Company seeks to accelerate the growth of the business while increasing positive social value and reducing its environmental footprint. To achieve this mission, we need to be able to identify, manage and effectively mitigate a broad spectrum of risks that could adversely impact our performance, financial viability and reputation. We have therefore developed a systematic and disciplined approach to risk management that operates at every level of the organization.

The risk management system, which is part of our broader internal control framework, is regularly reviewed by the Internal Audit, whose routine audits also cover compliance with the Company's anti-corruption and anti-fraud polices. The Internal Audit reports its findings and recommendations for further action to the Board of Director.

More details on risk management during the reporting period are presented in the Company's 2023 Annual Report.

# Kinerja Keberlanjutan

Budaya Perusahaan dibangun di atas nilai-nilai dasar kami, yang dapat dilihat dalam Laporan Tahunan 2023 kami. Kami ingin menanamkannya secara kuat dalam organisasi dengan memastikan nilai-nilai tersebut dipahami dan ditunjung tinggi oleh setiap karyawan. Kode etik ini memberikan landasan untuk menjalankan bisnis secara berkelanjutan dan berintegritas dengan cara menciptakan nilai bagi seluruh pemangku kepentingan. Seluruh karyawan menerima buku pedoman kode etik perusahaan, yang berisi panduan bagi karyawan untuk menerapkan nilai-nilai perusahaan dalam interaksi dan pekerjaan sehari-hari. Pedoman Perilaku ini memastikan kepada kami menjalankan bisnis dengan integritas, keadilan dan transparansi. Nilai-nilai yang terkandung dalam kode etik mewakili budaya perusahaan.

# Kinerja Ekonomi

Total pra penjualan menckat 11,17% year-on-year menjadi Rp2,31 trilium di tahun 2023 dari Rp2,07 triliun di tahun 2022, terutama didorong oleh penjualan rumah tapak yang menyumbang Rp2,10 trilium atop sekitar 91,27% dari total marketing sales di tahun 2023. Bintaro Jaya terus mendominasi segmen rumah tapak, mempertahankan pertumbuhan penjualan sebesar 15,79% dari tahun ke tahun dan berkontribusi sekitar 57,00% thereof prai penjualan, sementara rumah-rumah dengan dapat mengalah yang lebih terjangkau di kawasan non-Bintaro terus menarik minat yang signifikan dari para pembeli dan berkontribusi sekitar 34,27% thereof prai penjualan di tahun 2023. Segmen kondominium menyumbang 8,73% dari total marketing sales.

Perseroan membrukukan total pendapatan sebesar Rp2,50 triliun pada tahun 2023, tumbuh  $10.83\%$  dari Rp2,26 triliun pada tahun 2022 dan melampaui target kami sebesar  $2.97\%$ , pengkitaran ini terutama disebabkan oleh menjadi hal, pertama, pengkitaran yang signifikan dari pendapatatan tanah dan bangunan dimana kami dapat banyak mengakui pendapatatan atas rumahtapak, selainitu kami juga kepada,banyak menjual rumah stok karena adanya kebjikan bebas PPN dari pemerintah. Kedua, karena pengkitaran pendapatan sewa mal yang telah pulih sepenuhnya dari pandemi Covid-19 pada tahun 2023.

# Sustainability Performance

The Company's culture is built on our core values, which can be seen in our 2023 Annual Report. We aim to embed it firmly within the organization by ensuring the values are understood and upheld by every employee. They provide the foundation for doing business sustainably and with integrity in a way that creates value for all our stakeholders. All employee receives the company's code of conduct manual, which contains guidelines for employees to implement the company's values in their daily interactions and work. The Code of Conduct ensures that we conduct business with integrity, fairness and transparency. The values contained in the code of conduct represent the company's culture.

# Economic Performance

Total marketing sales increased by  $11.17\%$  year-on-year to Rp2.31 trillion in 2023 from Rp2.07 trillion in 2022, driven principally by landed house sales, which accounted for Rp2.10 trillion or approximately  $91.27\%$  of total marketing sales in 2023. Bintaro Jaya continued to dominate the landed house segment, maintaining sales growth at a robust  $15.79\%$  year-on-year and contributing approximately  $57.00\%$  to total marketing sales, while our more affordable midpriced homes in non-Bintaro developments continued to attract significant interest from buyers and accounted for approximately  $34.27\%$  of total marketing sales in 2023. The condominium segment delivered  $8.73\%$  of total marketing sales.

The Company booked total revenue of Rp2.50 trillion in 2023, a growth of  $10.83\%$  from Rp2.26 trillion in 2022 and surpassing our target by  $2.97\%$ , this increase was mainly due to several things, firstly, a significant increase in land and building revenue which we recognized quite a lot of revenue on landed houses, besides that, we also sold quite a lot of stock houses due to the VAT-free policy from the government. Secondly, it was due to the increase in mall rental income which has fully recovered from the Covid-19 pandemic in 2023.

Laba bruto großingkat dari Rp1,30 triliun pada tahun 2022 menjadi Rp1,46 triliun pada tahun 2023, tumbuh  $12,54\%$  dari Rp1,30 triliun pada tahun 2022. Peningkatan ini sejalan dengan pengingga dan pendapatan konsolidasi pada tahun 2023.

Laba usaha mengalami peningkatan sebesar  $14,86\%$  dari Rp965,07 miliar menjadi Rp1,11 triliun pada tahun 2023 atas  $8,26\%$  telah tinggi dari target yang telah ditetapkan. Pertumbuhan labu usaha terutama didorong oleh peningkatan pendapatan usahasebagaimana disebutkan di atas.

Laba tahun berjalan yang dapat diatribusikan kepada Pemilik Entitas Induk tambuh 16,69% menjadi Rp1,00 triliun pada tahun 2023 dari Rp860,91 miliar pada tahun 2022, atas lebih tinggi 8,87% dari ekspektasi kami, selain karena peningkatan pendapatan, peningkatan yang@cukup signifikan ini,dikarenakan adanya efisiensi pada(Beban usaha.

Gross profit increased from Rp1.30 trillion in 2022 to Rp1.46 trillion in 2023, a growth of  $12.54\%$  from Rp1.30 trillion in 2022. This improvement was in line with the increase in consolidated revenue in 2023.

The Company experienced an increase in operating profit by  $14.86\%$ , from Rp965.07 billion to Rp1.11 trillion in 2023 or  $8.26\%$  ahead of our target. The growth in operating profit was mainly driven by the increase in revenues as referred above.

Income for the year attributable to Owners of the Parent grew by  $16.69\%$  to Rp1.00 trillion in 2023 from Rp860.91 billion in 2022, or  $8.87\%$  ahead of our expectations, apart from the increase in revenue, this significant increase was due to cost efficiency in operating expenses.

# Performance of investment portfolios and projects compatible with sustainability implementation

The Company is a partner in Jaya Mitra Sarana, a joint venture with a local municipal water company (PDAM). Through this company, we have invested in water pipelines to distribute treated surface water supplied by PDAM to homes and businesses in Bintaro Jaya. We achieve  $91\%$  from the target for distributed PDAM water to residence.

We collaborated with PT Sumampau Pembangunan Lestari to build the aviary park. Aviary Park is a family recreation center that has educational value to provide a space for the wider community to understand the importance of maintaining biodiversity for future generations and provide positive benefits to the environment and surrounding communities, as an effort to improve the ecosystem, such as planting 10,000 trees and 50,000 shrubs. # Use of Environmentally Friendly Materials

We use environmentally friendly materials in our home construction. With around of  $95\%$  our home has built with environmentally friendly designs and materials. The Company has increasingly incorporated environment-friendly materials and features in our house construction to replace nonrenewable materials and/or increase energy and water efficiency. # Penggunaan Air

Ketidakcukupan air merupakan masalah mendesak di wilayah Jakarta Raya, di mana jutaan orang makeshift bergantung pada air tanah yang tidak berkelanjutan dan semakin terkontaminasi. Kami memiliki kemitraanjangka ropert dengan PDAM Tangerang Selatan, perusahaan air regional, untuk menyediakan air yang bersumber secara berkelanjutan dan telah diolah kepada semua ropert Barang dan roperty komersial kami di area Bintaro. Infrastruktur pipa dan layanan secara Berkala ditingkatkan untuk memastikan bahwa penduduk kami menerima pasokan air berkualitas secara konsisten. Konsumsi air PDAM mencapat dari 4.918.064 meter kubik menjadi 5.095.326 meter kubik di Bintaro Jaya.

Perusahaan juga membuat Water Treatment Plant untuk mengalah air di Kawasan Graha Raya. Penggunaan air dengan Water Treatment Plant sebesar 1.304.050 meter kubik mencakati hari 1.244.922 meter kubik.

# Water use

Water scarcity is an urgent problem in the greater Jakarta area, where millions still depend on unsustainable and increasingly contaminated groundwater. We have a longstanding partnership with PDAM Tangerang Selatan, the regional water company, to supply sustainably sourced and treated water to all our new clusters and commercial properties in the Bintaro area. The pipeline infrastructure and service are regularly upgraded to ensure that our residents receive a consistent, high quality water supply. The PDAM water consumption increased from 4,918,064 cubic to 5,095,326 cubic in Bintaro Jaya.

The company has established a water treatment plant for water production in Graha Raya. The water treatment plant usage in Graha Raya is 1,304,050 cubic meters, up from 1,244,922 cubic meters.

Pembangunan berorientasi transportasi (TOD) kami di Bintaro Jaya dirancang untuk mencikatkan aksesibilitas ke terbagai fungsi dan layanan bagi pengguna transportasi publik, pejalan kaki, dan pengendara sepeda, seesinga mencikatkan keamanan dan berkontribusi pada pengurangan emisi gas rumah kaca. Pada tahun 2020, Perusahaan menandatangani perjanjian dengan KAI untuk mencikatkan akses ke Stasiun Pondok Ranji dan Stasiun Jurangmangu dari Plaza Bintaro Jaya Superblock (melalui Bintaro Plaza Residence Condominium) dan Bintaro Jaya Xchange Mall, masing-masing. Kami juga terus mencikatkan layanan bus In-Trans, route sepeda, dan trotoar yang menawarkan konektivitas bebas mobil antara area residenial, pusat transportasi, dan fasilitas penting di Bintaro Jaya dan Graha Raya.

# Limbah dan Sampah

Kami memilah limbah organik dan non-organik. Limbah organik dijadikan kompos dan digunakan sebagai pupuk untuk tananan di area pengembangan kami kepada digunakan untuk budidaya larva. Limbah non-organik dilakukan daur ulang oleh digunakan kembali. Kami telah mengenalkan berbagai cara untuk mengelola limbah secara berkelanjutan dengan melibatkan penduduk dan pihak ketiga.

Perusahaan mendirikan bank sampahagar warga dapat membraba sampah anorganik rumah tangganya untuk didaur ulang dan juga bekerjasama dengan pihak ketiga untuk memilah dan mengolah sampah. Sampah tersebut dipilah menjadi sampah organik, anorganik, dan limbah sisa. Sampah organik diolah menjadi makanan untuk budidaya maggot. Sampah anorganik yang masih bernilai ekonomis dikirim ke industri daur ulang. Pada tahun 2023, kami menangani 12 ton sampah per hari.

Tidak ada tumpahan bahan berbahaya dan beracun oleh limbah selama Perusahaan beroperasi pada tahun 2023.

Mereka juga dapat mengunjungi departemen layanan customer service atau mengirim email kepada kami mengenai keluhan lingkungan. In addition to planting trees to maintain air quality, the Company has adopted a sustainable approach to planning in our developments, of which one of the intended impacts is reducing harmful emissions. Our transport-oriented developments (TOD) in Bintaro Jaya are designed to enhance accessibility to various functions and services for public transit users, pedestrians and cyclists and in so doing, improve safety and contribute to a reduction in greenhouse gas emissions. To accomplish this, we are engaging with various stakeholders including KAI, the national railway operator, In 2020, the Company signed agreements with KAI to further improve access to Pondok Ranji Station and Jurangmangu Station from the Plaza Bintaro Jaya Superblock (via Bintaro Plaza Residence Condominium) and Bintaro Jaya Xchange Mall, respectively. # Waste and Effluent

We separate organic and non-organic waste. Organic waste is composted and used as fertilizer for plants in our development areas or used for maggot cultivation. Inorganic waste is recycled or reused. We are have introduced various initiatives to handle waste sustainably in partnership with residents and third parties.

The Company have established a waste bank where residents can bring their household inorganic waste for recycling and also collaborate with a third party, to sort and process the waste. The waste is segregated into organic waste, inorganic waste, and residual waste. Organic waste is processed into food for maggot cultivation. Inorganic waste that still holds economic value is sent to recycling industries. In 2023 we handled 12 tons of waste per day

There were no spills of hazardous and toxic materials or waste in the course of the Company's operations in 2023.

# Environmental Complaints

We provide access for the public to submit complaints regarding environmental management. Citizens can lodge complaints regarding the environment through the 360-degree application. They can also visit our customer service department or send an email regarding environmental complaints. During 2022, we did not receive any material complaints related to the environmental management from the public.

Berkat kesiapan Perusahaan untuk segera menyelesaikan pengaduan lingkungan, kami tidak menerima sanksi atas denda karena ketidakpatuhan terhadap ketentuan dan peraturan lingkungan pada tahun 2023.

Salah situ tujuan kami adalah membrangun komunitas yang berkelanjutan dimana masyarakat dan bisnis dapat BERkembang bersama dalam lingkungan yang sehat dan hijau. Kami mencaya bahwa pengembangan perumahan dan komersial kami menghasilkan peluang ekonomi dan manfaat bidi masyarakat di sekitarnya dengan mencikatkan pendapatan, mendorong permintaan akan Barang dan jasa lokal, serta mencikatkan nilai tanah di sekitar wilayah projek kami. Perusahaan juga memberikan kontribusi yang substansial kepada masyarakat umum melalui pembayaran pajak badandan pajak daerah.

Dalam segi sosial, kami berupaya untuk menc Gatkan akses terhadap pendidikan berkualitas bagi karyawan dan masyarakat sekitar. Melalui Yayasan Marga Pembangunan Jaya yang dimiliki oleh Grup Pembangunan Jaya, kami memberikan bebasiswa ditingkat sekolah dan universitas serta memberikan kontribusi yang signifikan untuk perbaikan sekolah di sekitar wilayah pengembangan kami. Selain itu, kami mendirikan perpustakaan Rumah Baca untuk memungkinkan anak-anak mengakses buku secara gratis. Terdapat menjadi kegiatan yang tersedia di dalam perpustakaan Rumah Baca, speerti program "Sahabat Belajar" yang dirancang untuk membantu anak-anak yang menghadapi kesulitan belajar dalam membraca dan berhitung. Kegiatan lainnya yaitu redistribusi sumbangan buku yang diberikan oleh masyarakat. Buku-buku ini kemudian didonasikan kepada komunitas literasi yang membutuhkan dan juga digunakan untuk kegiatan anak-anak di daerah yang terkena bencana.

Demi mengurangi emisi lingkungan dan mendukung masyarakat dalam menjagungan transportasi umum, Perusahaan telah memberikan kontribusi tersebut dalam mencapatkan transportasi umum di wilayah Bintaro Jaya, dengan membuat upgradeiburbesaran pada duala stasiun kereta komuter di area tersebut, memperbaiki akses ke jaringan TransJakarta dan MRT, menyediakan layanan bus shuttle InTrans, serta jalur sepeda dan pedestrian.

Kami meyakini telah kegiatan yang disebutkan di atas memiliki dampak positif bagi perusahaan dalam mempererat hubungan dengan mayarakat sekitar.

# Community

Impact on Local Communities We have recently completed new projects, such as Bintaro Xchange Mall 2, and BX Sea (Aquarium). These efforts not only aim to increase the value of the Bintaro area, but also to create a positive social impact by expanding employment opportunities in the Bintaro area. The Company consistently prioritizes the recruitment of employees who live around the Company's development area. In addition, BX Sea has provide educational opportunities for the community regarding aquatic life and the underwater ecosystem.

One of our goals is to build sustainable communities where people and businesses can thrive together in a healthy, green environment. We believe that our residential and commercial developments generate economic opportunities and benefits for the communities in their vicinity by increasing incomes, driving demand for local goods and services and increasing the value of the land in the immediate vicinity of our project areas. The Company also makes a substantial contribution to society in general through our payment of corporate taxes and local taxes.

In social terms, we strive to improve access to quality education for employees and the surrounding community. Through the Marga Pembangunan Jaya Foundation owned by the Pembangunan Jaya Group, we provide scholarships at both school and university levels and also make significant contributions to the improvement of schools in the vicinity of our development areas. Additionally, we establish Reading House libraries to enable children to access books for free. There are several activities available within the Reading House libraries such as creating "Sahabat Belajar" program to assist children facing difficulties learning in reading and arithmetic. Other activity are redistributes book donations provided by the community. These books are then donated to literacy communities in need and also utilized for children's activities in disaster-stricken areas.

In order to reduce environmental emissions and support the community using public transportation, The Company has made a significant contribution to improving public transport in the Bintaro Jaya area, with major upgrades to the two commuter rail stations in the area, access to the TransJakarta and MRT networks and the provision of the InTrans shuttle bus service as well as bike paths and footpaths.

We believe that the activities mentioned above have a positive impact on the company in fostering relationships with the surrounding community.

Kegiatan operasioanal yang dilakukan oleh Perusahaan juga memiliki dampak negatif bagi masyarakat. Dampak negatif utama dari operasi kami adalah ketidaknyamanan bagi penduduk setempat yang disebabkan oleh kegiatan pembangunan kami, terutama dalam pentuk kebisingan, debu, dan peningkatan volume lalu lintas di sekitar lokasi proyek. Namun, hal ini bersifat sementara dan kami berusaha sebaik mungkin untuk mengurangi dampaknya pada masyarakat ada menyelesaikan segala keluhan dengan cepat.

# Tanggung Jawab untuk Pengembangan Produkt dan Pelayanan Berkelanjutan

Kami menyediakan akses ke informasi yang lengkap tersebut Produk kami, peluncuran Produkbaru, penawaran dan promosi secara langsung melalui tim pemasaran kami yang terlatih di galeri pemasaran kami, pertemuan dengan pelangan, pameran property dan sebagainya. Pelangan juga dapat terlibat melalui platform media sosial kami dan mengakses informasi di situs web kami.

Kami menjamin petugas dapat dihubungi oleh pelanggan melalui berbagai saluran. Pelanggan dapat menghubungi kami untuk mencampaikan pendapat, saran, pertanyaan, dan keluhan melalui email, surat, atasanya langsung datang ke kantor kami. Semua keluhan akan mendapat tanggapan.

# Inovasi dan Pengembangan Produkt/ Pelayanan Berkelanjutan

Kami berkomitmen untuk membranung rumah dengan mengguncan bahan bangunan ramah lingkungan. Baja dan aluminium telah menggantikan kayu keras yang tidak dapat diperbarui sebagai dasar struktural rumah kami. Perusahaan bekerja sama dengan arsitek untuk merancang rumah dengan desain inovatif yang memanfaatkan ruang secara efisien, cahaya alami, dan sirkulasi udara guna mengurangi konsumsi listrik dan mencakatan nilai bagi pelanggan kami.

Kami membrangun ruang terbuka hijau di setiap kawasan perumahan yang dilengkapi dengan polder untuk mengumpulkan air. Air ini digunakan untuk menyiram tanaman. Ruang terbuka hijau dapat menyerap panas dan mengurangi suhu udara di sekitarnya. Hal ini membuat lingkungan sekitar menjadi lebih nyaman. Selain itu, ruang terbuka hijau juga dapat mencakatan keanekaragaman hayati.

# Melakukan Evaluasi Produk untuk Keselamatan Pelanggan

Kami Selalu memprioritaskan kualitas Produk dengan memperhatikan keselamatan peluangan. Semua properti Perusahaan dibangun sesuai dengan standar dan regulasi pemerintah yang berlaku untuk konstruksi dan bahan, seda semua prosedur lisensi dan sertifikasi yang diperlukan. Semua bangunan komersial kami memiliki servifikat kelayakan bangunan (SLF), yang mencakup ketahanan gempa dan manajemen bencana; pencegahan kebakaran, termasuk kepadauhan terhadap kode keselamatan kebakaran dan memastikan pemadam api tidak kadaluarsa; dan penyediaan perlindungan dari petir, orang topan, serta sirkulasi udara yang sehat. Kami juga memasang peralatan keamanan standar industri di properti komersial kami, termasuk mal dan(AP)aparemien,untuk memastikan keselamatan penghuni, penyewa, dan pengunjung.

# Responsibility for the Development of Sustainable Products and Services

We provide access to comprehensive information about our products, new launches, offers and promotions directly via our trained marketing teams at our marketing galleries, customer gatherings, property exhibitions and so on. Customers can also engage through our social media platforms and access information on our website.

We ensure that Company personnel are accessible to customers through multiple channels. Customers can contact us with opinions, suggestions, inquiries and complaints via email, mail or in person at our offices. All complaints will receive a response.

# Innovation and Development of Sustainable Products/Services

We are committed to constructing houses with environmentally friendly building materials. Steel and aluminium have replaced non-renewable hardwoods for many of the structural elements of our homes. The Company collaborate with architects to design houses with innovative designs that utilize space efficiently, natural light, and air circulation to reduce electricity consumption and enhance value for our customers.

We build green spaces in each housing cluster equipped with a polder to collect water. This water is utilized for watering plants. Green open spaces can absorb heat and reduce the air temperature in their surroundings. This makes the surrounding environment more comfortable. Additionally, green open spaces can also enhance biodiversity.

# Products Evaluated for Customer Safety

We always prioritize product quality with regard to customer safety. All the Company's properties are built in compliance with the government's prevailing standards and regulations for construction and materials, as well as all required licensing and certification procedures. All our commercial buildings possess certificates of building worthiness (SLF), which covers earthquake resistance and disaster management; fire prevention, including compliance with the fire safety code and ensuring that fire extinguishers have not expired; the and the provision of antilightning, anti-hurricane and healthy air circulation measures. We also install industry-standard security equipment in our commercial properties, including malls and apartments, to ensure the safety of residents, tenants and visitors.

Perusahaan melakukan evaluasi pekerjaan terhadap prosedur kerja konstruksi dan secara rutin melakukan audit. Audit dilakukan secara internal dan eksternal. Sistem iniunjati acuan untuk evaluasi rutin terhadap properti kami selama konstruksi dan setelah Produk jadi. Tim proyek kami melakukan pemeriksaan detail terhadap kualitas dan kondisi bangunan sebelum serah terima oleh kontraktor. Pemeriksaan detail terakhir dari setiap properti jugada lilakukan oleh departemen Pemasaran sebelum diserahkan kepada pelanggan, yang juga menerima informasi mengenai bahan yang digunakan, fasilitas yang tersedia, dan fitur lainnya dari properti tersebut. Semua rumah kami difjual dengan jaminan 1 tahun untuk masalah struktural dan jaminan 3 bulan untuk masalah umum.

Berdasarkan haben penilaian dan masukan dari pelanggan, tidak ada dari properti kami yang memiliki dampak negatif tersebut terhadap pelanggan.

# Dampak Positif dan Negatif Berkelanjutan dari Produk dan/atau Pelayanan

Dampak positif dan negatif utama dariproduk properti berkelanjutan kami dapat dirangkum sebagai berikut:

# Dampak Positif

- Masyarakat dapat memperoleh hunian dengan tidak terjangkau dan desain yang ramah lingkungan;  
Menciptakan kesempatan kerja  
- Penduduk dapat menjadi lingo kungan yang bersih, teratur, dan terawat dengan baik;  
- Pengembangan kami memiliki pengaruh positif terhadap nilai tanah di sekitarnya.

# Dampak Negatif

- Penduduk dan masyarakat setempat mungkin mengalamigangguan akibat kebisingan, debu dan emisi karbon dari kendaruan projek selama konstruksi;  
Kawasan pengembangan kami dapat berkontribusi terhadap peningkatan kemacetan lalu lintas di sekitarnya.

# Kepuasan Pelanggan

Kepuasan pelanggan adalah sudah dapat indicator yang kami gunakan untuk mencurveusi kinerja kami. Kami memantau masukan yang kami terima melalui berbagai saluran speerti platform media sosial,kontak konsumen,dan mekanisme pengaduan kami.Kami juga melakukan survei pelanggan tahunan, yang dikelola secara independen untuk memastikan proses dan hasilnya transparan, independen,dan akuntabel.

The company conducts job evaluations on construction process work procedures and regularly conducts audits. Audits are conducted internally and externally. This system is the reference for our regular evaluations of our properties during construction and of the finished product. Our project team conducts detailed inspections of the quality and condition of the buildings before handover by the contractor and The final detailed inspection of each property is also conducted by the Marketing department prior to handover to the customer, who also receives a description of the materials used, the facilities available and other features of the property. All our houses are sold with a 1-year guarantee for structural issues and a 3-month guarantee for general issues.

According to the results of our assessments and customer feedback, none of our properties have a negative major impact on customers.

# Positive and Negative Impacts of Sustainable Products and/or Services

The principal positive and negative impacts of our sustainable property products can be summarized as follows :

# Positive impacts

- The public has access to affordable price and sustainably designed housing;  
Creation of decent work opportunities  
- Residents can enjoy a clean, organized and well maintained environment;  
Our developments have a positive influence on land values in the vicinity.

# Negative impacts

- Residents and local communities may experience disturbance due to noise, dust and carbon emissions from project vehicles during construction;  
Our development areas may contribute to increased traffic congestion in the vicinity

# PT Jaya Real Property Tbk

# Opini

Kami telah mengaudit laporan keuangan konsolidasian PT Jaya Real Property Tbk dan entitas anaknya ("Grup"), yang terdiri dari laporan posisi keuangan konsolidasian tanggal 31 Desember 2023, serta laporan laba rugi dan penghasilan komprehensif lain konsolidasian, laporan perubahan ekuitas konsolidasian, dan laporan arus kas konsolidasian untuk tahun yang berakhir pada tanggal tersebut, serta catatan atas laporan keuangan konsolidasian, termasuk ikhtisar kebujakan akuntansi material.

Menurut opini kami, laporan keuangan konsolidasian terlampir mencayakan secara wajar, dalam semua hal yang material, posisi keuangan konsolidasian Grup tanggal 31 Desember 2023, serta kinerja keuangan dan arus kas konsolidasiannya untuk tahun yang berakhir pada tanggal tersebut, sesuai dengan Standar Akuntansi Keuangan di Indonesia.

# Basis Opini

Kami melaksanakan audit kami berdasarkan Standar Audit yang ditetapkan oleh Institut Akuntan Publik Indonesia. Tanggung jawab kami menurut standar tersebut diuraikan lebih lanjut dalam paragraf Tanggung Jawab Auditor terhadap Audit atas Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian pada laporan kami. Kami independen terhadap Grup berdasarkan ketentuan etika yang relevant dalam audit kami atas laporan keuangan konsolidasian di Indonesia, dan kami telah memenuhi tanggung jawab etika lainnya berdasarkan ketentuan tersebut. Kami yakin kepada bukti audit yang telah kami peroleh adalahcekup dan dapat untuk menyediakan suatu basis bagi opini audit kami.

# Opinion

We have audited the consolidated financial statements of PT Jaya Real Property Tbk and its subsidiaries ("the Group"), which comprise the consolidated statement of financial position as at December 31, 2023, and the consolidated statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income, consolidated statement of changes in equity, and consolidated statement of cash flows for the year then ended, and notes to the consolidated financial statements and, including a summary of material accounting policies.

In our opinion, the accompanying consolidated financial statements present fairly, in all material respects, the consolidated financial position of the Group as at December 31, 2023, and its consolidated financial performance and cash flows for the year then ended in accordance with Indonesian Financial Accounting Standards.

# Basis for Opinion

We conducted our audit in accordance with Standards on Auditing established by the Indonesian Institute of Certified Public Accountant. Our responsibilities under those standards are further described in the 'Auditors' responsibilities for the audit of the Consolidated Financial Statements paragraph of our report. We are independent of the Group in accordance with the ethical requirements that are relevant to our audit of the Consolidated Financial Statements in Indonesia, and we have fulfilled our other ethical responsibilities in accordance with these requirements. We believe that the audit evidence we have obtained is sufficient and appropriate to provide a basis for our opinion.

# Key Audit Matter

Key audit matter is a matter that, in our professional judgement, was of most significance in our audit of the consolidated financial statements of the current period. This matter was addressed in the context of our audit of the consolidated financial statements as a whole, and in forming our opinion thereon, and we do not provide a separate opinion on this matter.

# Measurement and Recognition of Revenue

The Group's revenues mainly comprise of sales of land lots, building units and condominiums.

Measurement and recognition of revenues, and the related policies are significant to our audit because the revenue is material to the consolidated financial statements. In addition, the Group's revenue measurement and recognition required the management to apply significant judgement and estimation, especially in the following aspects: a) determination of the transaction price; and b) revenue recognition at a point in time based on the transfer of control of assets at a certain point in time (fulfillment of performance obligation at a certain point in time).

In determining the transaction price, the Group considers whether the selling price of the real estate property includes significant financing component.

The Group also evaluates when the control over the inventories has been transferred to the customer as basis of the timing of the revenue recognition, point in time or over time recognition. Revenue from the sale inventories is recognized at a point in time when inventories are delivered to the customers. The timing of revenue recognition required judgement on whether the Group has transferred significant risks and rewards of ownership in the inventories to the customers and whether Group has a substantial continuing involvement with the inventories.

The Group's disclosures regarding revenue recognition are described in Notes 2.q and 25.

We respond to key audit matter by conducting audit procedures which include:

We obtained an understanding and tested key internal controls over the Group's revenue recognition process and policies of selling of land lots, building units and condominiums, especially property units, including understand the type of sales transactions during the year. We tested management's analysis regarding the

# Other Information

Management is responsible for the other information. The other information comprises the information included in the annual report, but does not include the consolidated financial statements and our auditors' report thereon. The annual report is expected to be made available to us after the date of this auditors' report.

Our opinion on the consolidated financial statements does not cover the other information and we will not express any form of assurance conclusion thereon.

In connection with our audit of the consolidated financial statements, our responsibility is to read the other information identified above when it becomes available and, in doing so, consider whether the other information is materially inconsistent with the consolidated financial statements or our knowledge obtained in the audit, or otherwise appears to be materially misstated.

When we read the annual report, if we conclude that there is a material misstatement therein, we are required to communicate the matter to those charged with governance and take appropriate actions in accordance with Standards on Auditing established by the Indonesian Institute of Certified Public Accountants.

# Tanggung Jawab Manajemen dan Pihak yang Bertanggung Jawab atas Tata Kelola terhadap Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian

Manajemen bertanggung jawab atas penyusunan dan penyajian wajar laporan keuangan konsolidasian ini sesuai dengan Standar Akuntansi Keuangan di Indonesia, dan atas pengendalian internal yang dianggap perlu oleh manajemen untuk memungkikan penyusunan laporan keuangan konsolidasian yang bebas dari kesalahan penyajian material, baik yang disebabkan oleh kecurangan maupun kesalahan.

Dalam penyusunan laporan keuang konsolidasian, manajemen bertanggung jawab untuk menjadi pemempertahankan kelangsungan usahanya, mengungkapkan, sesuai dengan kondisinya, hal-hal yang Berkaitan dengan kelangsungan usaha, dan menc gunakan basis akuntansi kelangsungan usaha,cekuali manajemen memiliki intensi untuk melikuidasi Grup kepada menghentikan operasi, atas tidak memiliki alternatively yang realistis selain melaksanakannya.

Pihak yang bertanggung jawab atas tata kelola bertanggung jawab untuk mengawasi proses pelaporan keuangan Grup.

# Tanggung Jawab Auditor terhadap Audit atas Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian

Tujuan kami adalah untuk memperoleh keyakinan memadai ingin apakah laporan keuangan konsolidasian secara keseluruhan bebas dari kesalahan penyajian material, baik yang disebabkan oleh kecurangan maupun kesalahan, dan untuk menerbitkan laporan auditor yang mencakup opini kami. Keyakinan memadai merupakan suatu tingkat keyakinan tinggi, namun bukan merupakan suatu jaminan Bahwa audit yang dilaksanan berdasarkan Standar Audit akan selalu mendeteksi kesalahan penyajian material ketika hal tersebut ada. Kesalahan penyajian dapat disebabkan oleh kecurangan maupun kesalahan dan dianggap material jika, baik secara individual maupun secara agregat, dapat diekspektasikan secara wajar akan mempengaruhi keputusan ekonomi yang diambil oleh pengguna berdasarkan laporan keuangan konsolidasian tersebut.

Sebagai bagian dari suatu audit berdasarkan Standar Audit, kami menerapkan pertimbangan profesional dan mempertahankan skeptisisme profesional selama audit. Kami juga:

# Responsibilities of Management and Those Charged with Governance for The Consolidated Financial Statements

Management is responsible for the preparation and fair presentation of the consolidated financial statements in accordance with Indonesian Financial Accounting Standards, and for such internal control as management determines is necessary to enable the preparation of consolidated financial statements that are free from material misstatement, whether due to fraud or error.

In preparing the consolidated financial statements, management is responsible for assessing the Group's ability to continue as a going concern, disclosing, as applicable, matters related to going concern and using the going concern basis of accounting unless management either intends to liquidate the Group or to cease operations, or has no realistic alternative but to do so.

Those charged with governance are responsible for overseeing the Group's financial reporting process.

# Auditor's Responsibilities for the Audit of the Consolidated Financial Statements

Our objectives are to obtain reasonable assurance about whether the consolidated financial statements as a whole are free from material misstatement, whether due to fraud or error, and to issue an auditor's report that includes our opinion. Reasonable assurance is a high level of assurance, but is not a guarantee that an audit conducted in accordance with Standards on Auditing will always detect a material misstatement when it exists. Misstatements can arise from fraud or error and are considered material if, individually or in the aggregate, they could reasonably be expected to influence the economic decisions of users taken on the basis of these consolidated financial statements.

As part of an audit in accordance with Standards on Auditing, we exercise professional judgement and maintain professional skepticism throughout the audit. We also:

Identify and assess the risks of material misstatement of the consolidated financial statements, whether due to fraud or error, design and perform audit procedures responsive to those risks, and obtain audit evidence that is sufficient and appropriate to provide a basis for

PT Jaya Real Property Tbk ("Perusahaan") didirikan pada tahun 1979 denganNama PT Bintaro Raya berdasarkan Undang-Undang Penananan Modal Dalam Negeri pada tanggal 25 Mei 1979 dengan Akta No. 36 yang dibuat di hadapan Hobropoerwanto, pada waku itu Notaris di Jakarta, yang kemudian diubah dengan Akta No. 14 dari notaris yang sama tanggal 6 Desember 1979. Akta pendirian tersebut telah disahkan oleh Menteri Kehakiman Republik Indonesia dalam Surat Keputusan No. Y.A. 5/498/24 tanggal 22 Desember 1979 dan diumumkan dalam Berita Negara Republik Indonesia No. 23 tanggal 18 Maret 1980, Tambahan Berita Negara Republik Indonesia No. 148.

Anggaran Dasar Perusahaan telah mengalami menjadi kali perubahan, terakhir berdasarkan Pernyataan Keputusan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa (RUPSLB) yang termuat dalam Akta Pernyataan Keputusan Rapat Perubahan Anggaran Dasar No.23 tanggal 8 Juni 2023 yang dibuat di hadapan Aulia Taufani, S.H., Notaris di Jakarta Selatan, ingin penesuaian pasal 3 Anggaran Dasar Perseroan, terkait dengan kegiatan Usaha Kehutanan Lainnya dalam lingkup Lembaga Konservasi Untuk Kepentingan Umum guna memenuhi Peraturan Kementerian Lingkungan Hidup dan Kehutanan Nomor 3 tahun 2021 ingin Standar Kegiatan Usaha Berbasis Risiko Sektor Lingkungan Hidup dan Kehutanan. Penesuaian Pasal 20 ayat 6 mengenai pengumuman laporan keuangan dilakukan mengikuti Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan yang berlaku dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku di tersebut modal. Perubahan ini telah disahkan oleh Menteri Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia dengan Surat Keputusan No. AHU-0033376.AH.01.02. TAHUN 2023 tanggal 15 Juni 2023.

Ruang lingkup kegiatan Perusahaan telah berusaha dalam bidang pembangunan yang meliputi konstruksi dan real estat, bidang jasa yang meliputi pengelolaan air dan pengelolaan air limbah, pengangkutan dan pergudangan, penyediaan akomodasi dan penyediaan makan minum, aktivitas profesional ilmiah dan teknis, hiburan dan rekreasi, perdagangan, dan pertanian, kehutanan, perikanan -,服务于 menjalankan usaha di bidang konservasi.

# 1.a. The Company's Establishment

PT Jaya Real Property Tbk ("the Company") was founded in 1979 under the name PT Bintaro Raya based on Domestic Investment Law on May 25, 1979 with Deed No. 36 which made in presence of Hobropoerwanto, at that time a Notary in Jakarta, which was later amended by Deed No. 14 of the same notary dated December 6, 1979. The deed of establishment was approved by the Minister of Justice of the Republic of Indonesia in Decree No. Y.A. 5/498/24 dated December 22, 1979 and announced in the State Gazette of the Republic of Indonesia No. 23 dated March 18, 1980, Additional State Gazette of the Republic of Indonesia No. 148.

The Company's Articles of Association have undergone several changes, most recently based on Statement of Decisions of the Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders (EGMS) contained in the Deed of Statement of Decisions on Amendments to the Articles of Association No. 23 dated 8 June 2023 made before Aulia Taufani, S.H., Notary in South Jakarta, regarding adjustments to article 3 of the Company's Articles of Association, related to other forestry business activities within the scope of Conservation Institutions for the Public Interest in order to comply with the Ministry of Environment and Forestry Regulation Number 3 of 2021 concerning Standards for Risk-Based Business Activities in the Environment and Forestry Sector. Adjustments to Article 20 paragraph 6 regarding the announcement of financial reports are carried out following the applicable Financial Services Authority Regulations and applicable laws and regulations in the capital market This change has been approved by the Minister of Law and Human Rights with Decree No. AHU-0033376.AH.01.02. TAHUN 2023 dated June 15, 2023.

The Company's scope of activities relates to development sector which includes construction and real estate, the service sector which includes water management and waste water management, transportation and warehousing, provision of accommodation and provision of food and drink, scientific and technical professional activities, entertainment and recreation, trade, and agriculture, forestry, fisheries sector as well as running a business in

PT Pembangunan Jaya, pemegang saham mayoritas Perusahaan, merupakan perusahaan yang  $38,80\%$  sahamnya dimiliki oleh Pemerintah Provinsi DKI Jakarta dan 61,20% sahamnya dimiligi oleh pihak swasta. Perusahaan telah anggota kelompok usaha Pembangunan Jaya.

# 1.b. Penawaran Umum Efek Perusahaan

Pada tanggal 2 Juni 1994, Perusahaan memperoleh pernyataan efektif dari Ketua Badan Pengawas Pasar Modal (Bapepam) dengan Surat Keputusan No. S-1008/PM/1994 untuk makukan penawaran umum perdana 35.000.000 saham dengan nilai nominal Rp1.000 (angka penuh) per saham kepada masyarakat melalui pasar modal dengan tidak Rp5.200 (angka penuh) per saham. Pencatatan saham dilakukan di Bursa Efek Jakarta pada tanggal 29 Juni 1994. Bersamaan dengan pencatatan saham-saham tersebut, seluruh saham milik pemegang saham lama sejumlah 200.000.000 saham juga turut dicationatkan (Company Listing), sehingga pada tanggal tersebut seluruh saham Perusahaan atau sejumlah 235.000.000 saham telah dicationatkan pada Bursa Efek Jakarta.

Berdasarkan keputusan RUPSLB yang termuat dalam akta No. 41 dan No. 42 tanggal 8 Mei 1996, yang dibuat di hadapan Sutjipto, S.H., pada waktuitu Notaris di Jakarta, para pemegang saham menyetujui pemecahan nilai nominal saham (stock split) dari Rp1.000 (angka penuh) per saham menjadi Rp500 (angka penuh) per saham. # 1.b. Public Offering of the Company's Shares

On June 2, 1994, the Company was notified by the Chairman of Capital Market Supervisory Board (Bapepam) in its Decree No. S-1008/PM/1994 to implement the initial public offering of its 35,000,000 ordinary shares with par value of Rp1,000 (full amount), the shares were offered to public through capital market at a price of Rp5,200 (full amount) per share. The shares were listed at the Jakarta Stock Exchange on June 29, 1994. Concurrently with the listing of those shares, the remaining 200,000,000 shares held by the existing shareholders were also listed (Company Listing), therefore since the date of listing, the entire shares of the Company totaling 235,000,000 shares had been effectively listed at the Jakarta Stock Exchange.

Based on the decision of RUPSLB as stated in the notarial deed No. 41 and No. 42 dated May 8, 1996 which has been made before Sutjipto, S.H., at that time a Notary in Jakarta, the shareholders had agreed to initiate stock split on the par value of share, previously from of Rp1,000 (full amount) per share to become Rp500 (full amount) per share. # 2. Informasi Kebijakan Akuntansi Material

# 2.a. Kepatuhan Terhadap Standar Akuntansi Keuangan (SAK)

Laporan keuang konsolidasian telah disusun dan disajikan seksuai dengan Standar Akuntansi Keuang di Indonesia yang meliputi Pernyataan Standar Akuntansi Keuang (PSAK) dan Interpretasi Standar Akuntansi Keuang (ISAK) yang diterbitkan oleh Dewan Standar Akuntansi Keuang - Ikatan Akuntan Indonesia (DSAK - IAl),{serta peraturan Pasar Modal yang berlaku antara lain Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan/Badan Pengawas Pasar Modal dan Lembaga Keuangan (OJK/Bapepam-LK) No. VIII.G.7tentang pedoman penyajian laporan keuangan, Keputusan Ketua Bapepam-LK No. KEP347/BL/2012 tentang penyajian dan pengungkapan laporan keuangan emiten atau perusahaan publik.

# 2.b. Dasar Pengukuran dan Penyusunan Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian

Laporan keuangan konsolidasian disusun dan disajikan berdasarkan asumsi kelangsungan usaha seda atas dasar akrual,cekuali laporan arus kas konsolidasian. Dasar pengukuran dalam penyusunan laporan keuangan konsolidasian ini telah konsep biaya perolehan,cekuali bereits akun tertentu yang didasarkan pengukuran lain sebagaimana dijelaskan dalam kebujakan akuntansi masingmasing akun tersebut. Biaya perolehan umumnya didasarkan pada nilai wajar imbalan yang diserahkan dalam pemerolehan aset.

Laporan arus kas konsolidasian disajikan dengan metode langsung (direct method) dengan mengelompokkan arus kas dalam aktivitas operasi, investasi dan pendanaan.

Mata uang penyajian yang digunakan dalam penyusunan laporan keuangan konsolidasian ini adalah Rupiah yang merupakan mata uang fungional Grup. Setiap entitas di dalam Grup menetapkan mata uang fungional sendiri sebagaimana diungkap pada Catatan 2.h dan

# 2. Material Accounting Policies Information

# 2.a. Compliance with the Financial Accounting Standards (SAK)

The consolidated financial statements were prepared and presented in accordance with Indonesian Financial Accounting Standards which include the Statement of Financial Accounting Standards (PSAK) and Interpretation of Financial Accounting Standards (ISAK) issued by the Financial Accounting Standard Board - Indonesian Institute of Accountant (DSAK - IAl), and regulations in the Capital Market include Regulations of Financial Services Authority/ Capital Market and Supervisory Board and Financial Institution (OJK/Bapepam-LK) No. VIII.G.7 regarding guidelines for the presentation of financial statements, Decree of the Chairman of Bapepam-LK No. KEPI-347/BL/2012 regarding presentation and disclosure of financial statements of the issuer or public company.

# 2.b. The Basis of Measurement and Preparation of Consolidated Financial Statements

The consolidated financial statements have been prepared and presented based on going concern assumption and accrual basis of accounting, except for the consolidated statements of cash flows. Basis of measurement in preparation of these consolidated financial statements is the historical costs concept, except for certain accounts which have been prepared on the basis of other measurements as described in their respective policies. Historical cost is generally based on the fair value of the consideration given in exchange for assets.

The consolidated statements of cash flows are prepared using the direct method by classifying cash flows into operating, investing and financing activities.

The presentation currency used in the preparation of the consolidated financial statements is Indonesian Rupiah which is the functional currency of the Group. Each entity in the Group determines its own functional currency as disclosed in Note 2.h and items

# 2.d. Principles of Consolidation

The consolidated financial statements incorporate the financial statements of the Group as described in Note 1.c.

A subsidiary is an entity controlled by the Group, ie the Group is exposed, or has rights, to variable returns from its involvement with the entity and has the ability to affect those returns through its current ability to direct the entity's relevant activities (power over investee).

The existence and effect of substantive potential voting rights that the Group has the practical ability to exercise (ie substantive rights) are considered when assessing whether the Group controls another entity.

The Group's consolidated financial statements incorporate the results, cash flows, assets and liabilities of the Company and all of its directly and indirectly controlled subsidiaries. Subsidiaries are consolidated from the effective date of acquisition, which is the date on which the Group effectively obtains control of the acquired business, until that control ceases.

A parent prepares consolidated financial statements using uniform accounting policies for like transactions and other events in similar circumstances. All intragroup transactions, balances, income, expenses and cash flows relating to transaction between entities of the group are eliminated in full, on consolidated.

The Group attributed the profit and loss and each component of other comprehensive income to the owners of the parent and non-controlling interest even though this results in the non-controlling interests having a deficit balance. The Group presents non-controlling interest in equity in the consolidated statement of financial position, separately from the equity owners of the parent.

Changes in the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary that do not result in loss of control are equity transactions (i.e. transactions with owners in their capacity as owners). When the proportion of equity held by non-controlling interest change, the Group adjusted the carrying amounts of the controlling interest and non-controlling interest to reflect the changes in their relative interest in the subsidiaries. Any difference between the amount by which the non-controlling interests are adjusted and the fair value of the consideration paid or received is recognised directly in equity and attributed to the owners of the parent.

# 2.e. Investasi pada Entitas Asosiasi

Entitas asosiasi adalah entitas dimana Grup memiliki kekuasaan untuk berpartisipasi dalam keputusan kebjakan keuangan dan operational investee, tetapi tidak mengendalankan ataumengendaliank bersama atas kebjakan tersebutbut (pengaruh signifikan).

Investasi pada entitas asosiasi dicatat dengan mencammenakan metode ekuitas. Dalam metode ekuitas, pengakuan awal investasi diakui sebesar biaya perolehan, dan jumlah tercatat ditambah kepada dikurang untuk menjalkui bagian atas laba rugi investee setelah tanggal perolehan. Bagian atas laba rugi investee diakui dalam laba rugi. Penerimaan distribusi dari investee mengurangi nilai tercatat investasi. Penesuayan terhadap jumlah tercatat tersebut juga mungkin dibutuhkan untuk perubahan dalam proporsi bagian investor atas investee yang timbul dari penghasilan komprehensif lain, termasuk perubahan yang timbul dari revaluasi aset tetap dan selisih penjabaran valuta asing. Bagian investor atas perubahan tersebut diakui dalam penghasilan komprehensif lain.

Grup menghentikan penggunaan metode ekuitas sejak tanggal ketika investasinya berhentiunjadi investasi pada entitas asosiasi sebagai berikut:  
(a) jika investasi menjadi entitas anak.
